Ant Design

# 

<span key="a608f07d0ff5424d9b6a97b6729078ff"><span offset-key="a608f07d0ff5424d9b6a97b6729078ff:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

# 

<span key="7e0ac71266ea436abc49a0cee24333df"><span offset-key="7e0ac71266ea436abc49a0cee24333df:0">How to implement ANT Design with React</span></span>

<span key="c3d873ac67b94d479c6c37f6a5ce84c3">*Following the Ant Design specification, we developed a React UI library* `antd` *that contains a set of high quality components and demos for building rich, interactive user interfaces.*</span>

<span key="00a85b99a5014fbfb475a1bf6c897775">*✨ Features*</span>

<span key="672b3ed3d3b6410ca2f238f87874a96f"><span offset-key="672b3ed3d3b6410ca2f238f87874a96f:0">🌈 Enterprise-class UI designed for web applications.</span></span>

<span key="df199be52a714cfb99afd9b46216fcde"><span offset-key="df199be52a714cfb99afd9b46216fcde:0">📦 A set of high-quality React components out of the box.</span></span>

<span key="ecb0ba0837774ac88949297478558d9b"><span offset-key="ecb0ba0837774ac88949297478558d9b:0">🛡 Written in TypeScript with predictable static types.</span></span>

<span key="a2c2ccd2ddf44d47a78ab56e17a65808"><span offset-key="a2c2ccd2ddf44d47a78ab56e17a65808:0">⚙️ Whole package of design resources and development tools.</span></span>

<span key="4d16df5b080140128b41c91126ba776a"><span offset-key="4d16df5b080140128b41c91126ba776a:0">🌍 Internationalization support for dozens of languages.</span></span>

<span key="c8f387710ccf4fbbb69194d6a7e1b289"><span offset-key="c8f387710ccf4fbbb69194d6a7e1b289:0">🎨 Powerful theme customization in every detail.</span></span>

<span key="cfee5581d38e4b6abfbc287a3b1adcb4"><span offset-key="cfee5581d38e4b6abfbc287a3b1adcb4:0">\_Source: \_</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="be9a0360d24743c8ac27beceebe6f28d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="16007de1ea9e42269febc6b6fb8c4ead"><em>Ant Design</em></span></span></a><span key="01b3f0f30a764a4db47117b9800f8f9e"><span offset-key="01b3f0f30a764a4db47117b9800f8f9e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="8733fa26f92d4647a6a2857e260f5ccc"><span offset-key="8733fa26f92d4647a6a2857e260f5ccc:0">I have found ANT Design as the smart option to design our web applications using react. It provides us high quality components which we will be observing while developing the project, in the article later on. If you look around to the documentation provided by ANT and observe its demo of different features, you will find ANT as the better option for you application. So we will be developing a simple react application using following ANT Components. So, let’s start!</span></span>

## 

<span key="a3feef7a067e4ab9955c1e67359e756a"><span offset-key="a3feef7a067e4ab9955c1e67359e756a:0">ANT Components</span></span>

<span key="bbe27b1164c945e08f2df633751ce995"><span offset-key="bbe27b1164c945e08f2df633751ce995:0">There are a lot of beautiful and useful components provided by ANT Design. But I will brief you about some of the basic components that we will be using to built a system with React and ANT in this article.</span></span>

<span key="e2b34ab60e6f4718bf0e5aceb772e53e">**1. Layout**<span offset-key="e2b34ab60e6f4718bf0e5aceb772e53e:1"> Layout is basically a wrapper, which consist of Header, Footer, Sider, Content and layout itself. You can modify plenty of things for your layout. Please refer to </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/layout/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1eb320d448a54a18aa1c74fe0f5f2cf5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d596a222b3c241ebb3b5bb754fd6d0d5"><span data-offset-key="d596a222b3c241ebb3b5bb754fd6d0d5:0">layout documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="d24b546b115a43fe8718004200265847"><span offset-key="d24b546b115a43fe8718004200265847:0"> of ANT for more.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="e8a226f8106148369bda243a655563d1"></span>

<span key="e31b3cf67a4548a38f8428b9b1a2e9bc"><span offset-key="e31b3cf67a4548a38f8428b9b1a2e9bc:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="12acca2ef93249f090e5fb0cd8058712"></span>

<span key="0301268072a14846911a2638db570c09"><span offset-key="0301268072a14846911a2638db570c09:0">Layout given by ANT</span></span>

<span key="e5d98e0db90d46d1ac404fb3f9fd5f7d">**2. Grid**<span offset-key="e5d98e0db90d46d1ac404fb3f9fd5f7d:1"> ANT Design is a 24 Grid System.The column Grid system in ANT Design is a value of 1–24 to represent its range spans. You can use Row for rows and Col for columns and you can have 24 columns in a row. You can define a col span lik &lt;Col span={8}> for columns of three equal widths. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/grid/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="cc80acbcd60f4c8198aa51482fc14ebf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b8adc1b459a14ec093810513171d3e2b"><span data-offset-key="b8adc1b459a14ec093810513171d3e2b:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="0c54155ba86c4a55b04eec687b33a352"><span offset-key="0c54155ba86c4a55b04eec687b33a352:0">.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="4e5b71d144c24e6ea33a1e271b161894"></span>

<span key="8cbb78860a8b40b095b099560f78757a"><span offset-key="8cbb78860a8b40b095b099560f78757a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="f264174bb0184c03b0444bc0b7424181"></span>

<span key="50baefa472b245b1a4c79db2657f14c6"><span offset-key="50baefa472b245b1a4c79db2657f14c6:0">Grid system of ANT</span></span>

<span key="e92608511e6a449b8b0a3513b1934e14">**3. Form**<span offset-key="e92608511e6a449b8b0a3513b1934e14:1"> ANT provides high performance Form Component with data scope management which includes data collection, verification and styles. Learn more about forms </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/form/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="843e5e6778fe4aa3835964b441b6cf74" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="1d9e0d2fb582434db28b29c60eb9b630"><span data-offset-key="1d9e0d2fb582434db28b29c60eb9b630:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="f5544a7eeace4ea4bf10de3e3ed95c52"><span offset-key="f5544a7eeace4ea4bf10de3e3ed95c52:0">.</span></span>

<span key="84319232889d4100af4f9bf7436953c9">**4. Input**<span offset-key="84319232889d4100af4f9bf7436953c9:1"> It is a basic widget for getting the user input as a text field. You can use input group, text area, format tooltip input and many more from input. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/input/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fb0f7ee5b3d648608213f64b7210a7be" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f74c7f6b68234a5396d2cbb903470e44"><span data-offset-key="f74c7f6b68234a5396d2cbb903470e44:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="f4dbda2d14094df0883e7a8771a38adb"><span offset-key="f4dbda2d14094df0883e7a8771a38adb:0">.</span></span>

<span key="4383b566d77b457a840d14f782b129c2">**5. Radio**<span offset-key="4383b566d77b457a840d14f782b129c2:1"> Radio is used to select a single state from multiple options. You can check out different use cases of Radio in Ant from </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/radio/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="43622b7b82e24ad2a7234fcd0b51e174" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="23b676e0c68d4eb292cfac0590a9eeae"><span data-offset-key="23b676e0c68d4eb292cfac0590a9eeae:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="a8103860cba541e2a10a6944f5f14b30"><span offset-key="a8103860cba541e2a10a6944f5f14b30:0">.</span></span>

<span key="8c80d45b9ec548b38c057b2d3f11bb8d">**6. Switch**<span offset-key="8c80d45b9ec548b38c057b2d3f11bb8d:1"> If you need to have switching between two states that is on-off state you can use Switch. I was really impressed with the pending state implemented in switch by ANT. For knowing more about it, please refer the document </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/switch/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3c9072cca5134496b6bcc84bb5defba8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="7b518d0836784a738d1752418e7ccabb"><span data-offset-key="7b518d0836784a738d1752418e7ccabb:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="be5354fda4234c7a916317e626e3f7b8"><span offset-key="be5354fda4234c7a916317e626e3f7b8:0">.</span></span>

<span key="cd31409d7f5947e8a5fe3b3534c712c1">**7. Slider**<span offset-key="cd31409d7f5947e8a5fe3b3534c712c1:1"> Slider component is used for displaying current value or the range of the value. ANT provides the better component for using Slider. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/slider/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="163103adb57348fea5618ea4539383a8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="989966155c4749ed8b41e7b1cd343a28"><span data-offset-key="989966155c4749ed8b41e7b1cd343a28:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="a4039dc6c14b4ce5aeb47c95f48e868f"><span offset-key="a4039dc6c14b4ce5aeb47c95f48e868f:0">.</span></span>

<span key="4f3bcb7d494b4fa1b8ed1445c029c0df">**8. Select**<span offset-key="4f3bcb7d494b4fa1b8ed1445c029c0df:1"> Select component allows us to select a value or set of values from the options available to us. There are many use cases of the select component defined by ANT. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/select/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1144531b073f4248bf8b0cc054e0b95b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="9bfb15c25f784d928dee297fd770dc07"><span data-offset-key="9bfb15c25f784d928dee297fd770dc07:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="bd511e2600ae4545b3ee1bf6b939ca62"><span offset-key="bd511e2600ae4545b3ee1bf6b939ca62:0">.</span></span>

<span key="f5bb530990344d7baf90afedc91fa9f6">**9. Message**<span offset-key="f5bb530990344d7baf90afedc91fa9f6:1"> We use message as the feedback in response to the operations performed by the user. We use message component for displaying feedback such as success, error, warning, etc. Message is displayed at top-center and will be dismissed automatically. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/message/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5bde77360e564010a30019098d4c74dc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ca0cca7e57f7429e9096ad3ac58606a2"><span data-offset-key="ca0cca7e57f7429e9096ad3ac58606a2:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="47e3c54f05754519a943e0383a2245fa"><span offset-key="47e3c54f05754519a943e0383a2245fa:0">.</span></span>

<span key="46b5bf40a7594e48bd4f67d566615f84">**10. Table**<span offset-key="46b5bf40a7594e48bd4f67d566615f84:1"> \*\*\*\*We can use Table to display a collection of structured data in rows. We can define dataSource and columns to display rows data and columns of the table. Learn more </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/table/#header" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0ecfbb04233d4e0cbf4e62a1ca35e4c2" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="1cdf6d6327494c35bce10a08602bf13a"><span data-offset-key="1cdf6d6327494c35bce10a08602bf13a:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="0ab01098f7264ce7a42487848cdbb373"><span offset-key="0ab01098f7264ce7a42487848cdbb373:0">.</span></span>

<span key="b4cf19c0468942dbaf4d71ab0dd31ebb">**11. Empty**<span offset-key="b4cf19c0468942dbaf4d71ab0dd31ebb:1"> You can use this component when there is nothing to display in your page or your component. I gives good User Experience as well. Learn more about Empty </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/empty/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="90e901a864ac411b8fbdeb45d885bb4c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="cb9f0adb8a3f4ada9320bc9a85c9f405"><span data-offset-key="cb9f0adb8a3f4ada9320bc9a85c9f405:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="a5a9f3ae62444098bbe36698bd139d68"><span offset-key="a5a9f3ae62444098bbe36698bd139d68:0">.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="4e2d17118db3445ead2be1dbad68ff54"></span>

<span key="6d515830dc5f423997c7b8cee44d06b4"><span offset-key="6d515830dc5f423997c7b8cee44d06b4:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="0eca9cbae4a14d5d9beedf489908aa5a"></span>

<span key="413e4e966a04439393eae5e817231e6a"><span offset-key="413e4e966a04439393eae5e817231e6a:0">ANT Empty Component</span></span>

## 

<span key="c3e1be92cab34beb8f34c2e7e22c1acd"><span offset-key="c3e1be92cab34beb8f34c2e7e22c1acd:0">Create React App</span></span>

<span key="5c82e189015a4de8a7729e2894ce853f"><span offset-key="5c82e189015a4de8a7729e2894ce853f:0">We somewhat touched the basic components we will be using now. So, now let’s create a new react project named \*\*react-ant \*\*with typescript.</span></span>

1

<span key="49d98d62f0ec4f01bd1b6bb36a9fc393"><span offset-key="49d98d62f0ec4f01bd1b6bb36a9fc393:0">npx create-react-app react-ant --template typescript</span></span>

2

<span key="4ba70f4102a141a08c4f885f7c2e83ce"><span offset-key="4ba70f4102a141a08c4f885f7c2e83ce:0">cd react-antnpm install --save typescript @types/node @types/react @types/react-dom @types/jest</span></span>

<span key="b9cb0d46aa224911830cc7af0e793ab8"><span offset-key="b9cb0d46aa224911830cc7af0e793ab8:0">We will be using </span>*React Router*<span offset-key="b9cb0d46aa224911830cc7af0e793ab8:2"> to navigate to different pages of the application. Let’s install them as well.</span></span>

1

## 

<span key="53070602203b4b8488a1be007e51c816"><span offset-key="53070602203b4b8488a1be007e51c816:0">Create Fake Json Server</span></span>

<span key="02dd34a38e534e3fbac8f14dafc7b644"><span offset-key="02dd34a38e534e3fbac8f14dafc7b644:0">We will be using the Fake Json Server for storing and retrieving our data locally. I am using it because our application is small and we will be storing and retrieving the data later on. Install Json Server with following command.</span></span>

1

<span key="7b68b944c4824590b7d0136bc3d74be5"><span offset-key="7b68b944c4824590b7d0136bc3d74be5:0">npm install -g json-server</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="695153c486204db4a3ec1adfafd0f0a2"><span offset-key="695153c486204db4a3ec1adfafd0f0a2:0">Create a folder named \_Server \_and create a file named \_db.json \_to record our data. We create a users collection in db.json which will be holding our users data later on.</span></span>

1

<span key="d6a6d3763ed846de939a0b864983a075"><span offset-key="d6a6d3763ed846de939a0b864983a075:0">{</span></span>

2

<span key="2983b94be9354767a302a3fbb5f8da21"><span offset-key="2983b94be9354767a302a3fbb5f8da21:0"> "users": \[\]</span></span>

3

<span key="89967f0d58c54b95bd3c864e9302b111"><span offset-key="89967f0d58c54b95bd3c864e9302b111:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="9740a5893be84e4ba4d3427d268b75bf"><span offset-key="9740a5893be84e4ba4d3427d268b75bf:0">npm start</span></span>

<span key="44746679c8284c26afd1b54697e54bce"><span offset-key="44746679c8284c26afd1b54697e54bce:0">Boom! You will get the empty user list with a beautiful layout and bunch of menus on the sidebar. It looks cool!</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="dac0099ba142409fb9a6b5bfb0e26ebc"></span>

<span key="84603fb8246142738d4be7f0b57b5080"><span offset-key="84603fb8246142738d4be7f0b57b5080:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="9dd649440d184be6a7262de20eb989e7"></span>

<span key="db393a392b9248c3bb9cadc8a689d519"><span offset-key="db393a392b9248c3bb9cadc8a689d519:0">Empty Table</span></span>

<span key="f2f4d825ee8a4c8eacd277560a954e24"><span offset-key="f2f4d825ee8a4c8eacd277560a954e24:0">Navigate to Add user and you will get this user form. It looks more cool!</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="fce6a293e2d54d3c93a326d759c79584"></span>

<span key="6c67a40e22ff4e52b7041e6dabde9d5c"><span offset-key="6c67a40e22ff4e52b7041e6dabde9d5c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="f7fd42d2d3c14ad2a8d25795d23b4b97"></span>

<span key="b1474247920b4b4d9411d3b498782294"><span offset-key="b1474247920b4b4d9411d3b498782294:0">User Form</span></span>

<span key="edeba86035014aacae79cfe977aca8a7"><span offset-key="edeba86035014aacae79cfe977aca8a7:0">Now fill up all the fields and click save or click back to navigate to the list page. You will see the loading on save button until the form gets submitted. Lets see how it looks like.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="89837c6559ce432c85e69e3e1f295f7f"></span>

<span key="4cb5e740b4f5434c9ce2c466c02c4635"><span offset-key="4cb5e740b4f5434c9ce2c466c02c4635:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="43c8861ded2b47e0a619037640577181"></span>

<span key="85dda95c8ed7477191b74a3b4a91da17"><span offset-key="85dda95c8ed7477191b74a3b4a91da17:0">New user added with a success message</span></span>

<span key="0ce8f12ff9924ed4a26ef18c5ad543a6"><span offset-key="0ce8f12ff9924ed4a26ef18c5ad543a6:0">This is how you can add new users and let’s see our empty components by navigating to videos from left menu.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="9d0c368eb3ba45dd8bb32c30b424d590"></span>

<span key="c16e02bb8990404db5a52bdcc205c4a0"><span offset-key="c16e02bb8990404db5a52bdcc205c4a0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="be874eff02a1436587bcafb570800c42"></span>

<span key="94ab1b561c3a48f2863d1bda0c68b5db"><span offset-key="94ab1b561c3a48f2863d1bda0c68b5db:0">Video page with no data</span></span>

<span key="f75a200c4772416d861f6039c4158f8c"><span offset-key="f75a200c4772416d861f6039c4158f8c:0">We implemented some of the basic components of Ant Design with React. There are a lot more components and designs provided by Ant. It is so easy to use and much efficient for the user experience. You can add more attributes to the application we developed just now, using other Ant Components. You can refer to my github link of the project for any confusions or you can write it down on the comments below as well. I will be covering more parts of ANT Design in upcoming articles too. Stay Tuned!</span></span>

# 

<span key="6073ab009cb34d4a95e06cf7ee338139"><span offset-key="6073ab009cb34d4a95e06cf7ee338139:0">Ant Design of React</span></span>

<span key="ff0011022ade49c0859f61eabab5678e"><span offset-key="ff0011022ade49c0859f61eabab5678e:0">Following the Ant Design specification, we developed a React UI library </span>`antd`<span offset-key="ff0011022ade49c0859f61eabab5678e:2"> that contains a set of high quality components and demos for building rich, interactive user interfaces.</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="7da50aee51c840d6a0c05e9661935c72"></span>

<span key="303a34d83d2941778bdde590f9cf1221"><span offset-key="303a34d83d2941778bdde590f9cf1221:0">+</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="0b1436e9ee4b433283257852673c0b22"></span>

<span key="663c98ab66d142af8b49377ea21d5120"><span offset-key="663c98ab66d142af8b49377ea21d5120:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="c826e4ebca28427183263469ab3b376a"><span offset-key="c826e4ebca28427183263469ab3b376a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#%E2%9C%A8-Features" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e9c38558bc194d05b6c9cc7b2b86adec" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="92a00ca38144417fb3c127cb6c8b3cb5"><span data-offset-key="92a00ca38144417fb3c127cb6c8b3cb5:0">✨ Features</span></span></span></a><span key="1063b646a970454e946a0d18016d6af9"><span offset-key="1063b646a970454e946a0d18016d6af9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="b6c62d4fc1d4477b946e6c750410cab1"><span offset-key="b6c62d4fc1d4477b946e6c750410cab1:0">✨ Features</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#%E2%9C%A8-Features" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e45da35f56af48eab1fdd85bb52f6f18" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b25fc75023954eb496f64032246a992f"><span data-offset-key="b25fc75023954eb496f64032246a992f:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="2b089c0ba6b8460595e60775d6088bea"><span offset-key="2b089c0ba6b8460595e60775d6088bea:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="f9a84fab5c6e452a854a8bf44269e16a"><span offset-key="f9a84fab5c6e452a854a8bf44269e16a:0">📦 A set of high-quality React components out of the box.</span></span>

    <span key="8c3b76dc6cf64edc94a4764864f28935"><span offset-key="8c3b76dc6cf64edc94a4764864f28935:0">🛡 Written in TypeScript with predictable static types.</span></span>

    <span key="20f95f97539d45f9ae47b67b937f1112"><span offset-key="20f95f97539d45f9ae47b67b937f1112:0">🌍 Internationalization support for dozens of languages.</span></span>

<span key="65e62ca630444f09a38bb08c75a4931a"><span offset-key="65e62ca630444f09a38bb08c75a4931a:0">Polyfills are needed for IE browsers. > <span key="e0e23deb221048adaa0c3b2a44ebc47d"><span offset-key="e0e23deb221048adaa0c3b2a44ebc47d:0">We drop support of IE8 after </span>`[email protected]`<span offset-key="e0e23deb221048adaa0c3b2a44ebc47d:2">, We drop support of React 15 and IE9/10 after </span>`[email protected]`<span offset-key="e0e23deb221048adaa0c3b2a44ebc47d:4">,</span></span>

## 

<span key="6a94638ca0e24acc9ee5726e2c77f661"><span offset-key="6a94638ca0e24acc9ee5726e2c77f661:0">Installation</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#Installation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="968ba521b0ef4a949d2b07a458e47eb3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="49a0268ba6164cb7bb1f74d5f66b8146"><span data-offset-key="49a0268ba6164cb7bb1f74d5f66b8146:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="94a002282d8d4daf980f32b367ea4bf7"><span offset-key="94a002282d8d4daf980f32b367ea4bf7:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="5bbe9214282f4f719215012dc0a6b203"><span offset-key="5bbe9214282f4f719215012dc0a6b203:0">Using npm or yarn</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#Using-npm-or-yarn" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e4a6454be599449093509d4dce5ef6f4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c7c99afb18fd4c5d927aeace16eea3ed"><span data-offset-key="c7c99afb18fd4c5d927aeace16eea3ed:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="8e1961e6c056411b925f0a4e255a19df"><span offset-key="8e1961e6c056411b925f0a4e255a19df:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="b9921fcaa46b473ababf2af21115dc82">**We recommend using npm or yarn to install**<span offset-key="b9921fcaa46b473ababf2af21115dc82:1">, it not only makes development easier, but also allow you to take advantage of the rich ecosystem of Javascript packages and tooling.</span></span>

1

<span key="b8595fd61260437392cace4931477165"><span offset-key="b8595fd61260437392cace4931477165:0">$ npm install antd</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

1

<span key="9b4b71f1a8074115905612c3490c6803"><span offset-key="9b4b71f1a8074115905612c3490c6803:0">$ yarn add antd</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="bcfccfe40eae4f34866ad0f2437718e6"><span offset-key="bcfccfe40eae4f34866ad0f2437718e6:0">If you are in a bad network environment, you can try other registries and tools like </span></span><a href="https://github.com/cnpm/cnpm" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8730a2ab2e434d4d8c0370be18704c5c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="82dbd086fa06457b997a79986a2d6273"><span data-offset-key="82dbd086fa06457b997a79986a2d6273:0">cnpm</span></span></span></a><span key="708fd3d6a0cf4d9395bd7c8c211ff7ba"><span offset-key="708fd3d6a0cf4d9395bd7c8c211ff7ba:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="4c3e080fcf064a6891e007ca95a9c00e"><span offset-key="4c3e080fcf064a6891e007ca95a9c00e:0">Import in Browser</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#Import-in-Browser" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a29c4f5dba39494b9e9752654b57cc00" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="48919e9e5f3b4b68abfeceee008dc1b3"><span data-offset-key="48919e9e5f3b4b68abfeceee008dc1b3:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="c852d9fe769241188d71fe7b1f9b1f9a"><span offset-key="c852d9fe769241188d71fe7b1f9b1f9a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="7f7c8398cd644e96916b939641ccc552"><span offset-key="7f7c8398cd644e96916b939641ccc552:0">Add </span>`script`<span offset-key="7f7c8398cd644e96916b939641ccc552:2"> and </span>`link`<span offset-key="7f7c8398cd644e96916b939641ccc552:4"> tags in your browser and use the global variable </span>`antd`<span offset-key="7f7c8398cd644e96916b939641ccc552:6">.</span></span>

<span key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3"><span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:0">We provide </span>`antd.js`<span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:2"> </span>`antd.css`<span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:4"> and </span>`antd.min.js`<span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:6"> </span>`antd.min.css`<span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:8"> under </span>`antd/dist`<span offset-key="81c9ff1b8788495ea8913d55c0be4ec3:10"> in antd's npm package. You can also download these files directly from </span></span><a href="https://cdnjs.com/libraries/antd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="68a4bf5f0f154b27ae2610e82b61dd84" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="5cf6cf4174cb4cb487c37e0ceee1ce02"><span data-offset-key="5cf6cf4174cb4cb487c37e0ceee1ce02:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="c65ab39d6f8e4aefadcfac0b937f2132"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="200c484b0fdc419c9acfd8ff301a6c09"><span offset-key="200c484b0fdc419c9acfd8ff301a6c09:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="6d435707a3ce43baa9af5a4f4681ca26"><span offset-key="6d435707a3ce43baa9af5a4f4681ca26:0">, </span></span><a href="https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/antd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a0ba17e8340c4d70880e2140c391c064" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="fc75ee41fe194186bc3c65d94fb13f86"><span data-offset-key="fc75ee41fe194186bc3c65d94fb13f86:0"><span data-slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span data-slate-void="true" data-key="bef2b3b5b5df4850909e597b4100e631"><span></span></span></span></a>

<span key="cba5ec53e1794c229cfc78c464239ea9"><span offset-key="cba5ec53e1794c229cfc78c464239ea9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span key="3abbc32f1bff4a45bf35cbb2b5e4199e"><span offset-key="3abbc32f1bff4a45bf35cbb2b5e4199e:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/antd/dist" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ab573693bfb8429db8a7078d86afe546" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="91248c8d6c7b4136b38c538221da38d3"><span data-offset-key="91248c8d6c7b4136b38c538221da38d3:0">unpkg</span></span></span></a><span key="c51fc98585c84584a94cdf66564d8a58"><span offset-key="c51fc98585c84584a94cdf66564d8a58:0">.</span></span>

> <span key="4d6212c913994712b471cb5833ea34d0">**We strongly discourage loading the entire files**<span offset-key="4d6212c913994712b471cb5833ea34d0:1"> this will add bloat to your application and make it more difficult to receive bugfixes and updates. Antd is intended to be used in conjunction with a build tool, such as </span></span><a href="https://webpack.github.io" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="65738c4f76174c688686f6ce83519b2a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="18beafc69bc94212bbefd220576fbb23"><span data-offset-key="18beafc69bc94212bbefd220576fbb23:0">webpack</span></span></span></a><span key="aae63d395cd945a1b607002784ea11a8"><span offset-key="aae63d395cd945a1b607002784ea11a8:0">, which will make it easy to import only the parts of antd that you are using.</span></span>
>
> <span key="8c0a8c64ec6d49d496425f8ccb6c78b7"><span offset-key="8c0a8c64ec6d49d496425f8ccb6c78b7:0">Note: you should import react/react-dom/moment before using antd.js.</span></span>

### 

<span key="655db6158d15481897e27099549ed356"><span offset-key="655db6158d15481897e27099549ed356:0">Use modularized antd</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#Use-modularized-antd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7fdcb3ce77ec4cb79184204a91118b95" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ba7b6110c50f4b5fa810e435f2d33f02"><span data-offset-key="ba7b6110c50f4b5fa810e435f2d33f02:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="ab0b8e3982b8467c9d0d5f9147f4806c"><span offset-key="ab0b8e3982b8467c9d0d5f9147f4806c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="9b336fd5e1f74b0591066c5891530c3c">`antd`<span offset-key="9b336fd5e1f74b0591066c5891530c3c:1"> supports ES modules tree shaking by default for JS part.</span></span>

### 

<span key="7f55fe0b7b7d40ca8a425ad18c4eaba8"><span offset-key="7f55fe0b7b7d40ca8a425ad18c4eaba8:0">TypeScript</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/introduce#TypeScript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3e48463db7de428a85e9d6d93c70f0f0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="8eb919fcb7a042f196f3c3a345747dce"><span data-offset-key="8eb919fcb7a042f196f3c3a345747dce:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="30d420207a874bacae76825e6d05a575"><span offset-key="30d420207a874bacae76825e6d05a575:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="48237ad573b54185b222b6d0c174a043">`antd`<span offset-key="48237ad573b54185b222b6d0c174a043:1"> provides a built-in ts definition, don't install </span>`@types/antd`<span offset-key="48237ad573b54185b222b6d0c174a043:3">.</span></span>

# 

<span key="fe4f1970ed614ee2becfa9f65947f228"><span offset-key="fe4f1970ed614ee2becfa9f65947f228:0">Getting Started</span></span>

<span key="ff0de8dcad15416b9c7f2a6fa4c68ad0"><span offset-key="ff0de8dcad15416b9c7f2a6fa4c68ad0:0">Ant Design React is dedicated to providing a </span>**good development experience**<span offset-key="ff0de8dcad15416b9c7f2a6fa4c68ad0:2"> for programmers. Before starting, it is recommended to learn </span></span><a href="https://reactjs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b47a968bc8154e4e8191bbad347f25a8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ca262ba39c8e4f05b5b45d3e1c54298c"><span data-offset-key="ca262ba39c8e4f05b5b45d3e1c54298c:0">React</span></span></span></a><span key="a6ab026018c64388b2419abfcd7bb430"><span offset-key="a6ab026018c64388b2419abfcd7bb430:0"> and </span></span><a href="http://babeljs.io/docs/learn-es2015/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e53bc0c8a9984e8db95aaf8c379484be" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="5f50cd85c21744728be928959518995e"><span data-offset-key="5f50cd85c21744728be928959518995e:0">ES2015</span></span></span></a><span key="df7a856ad1d345b99b62dd7aa9341d4a"><span offset-key="df7a856ad1d345b99b62dd7aa9341d4a:0"> first, and correctly install and configure </span></span><a href="https://nodejs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0c9b4be5ffb749a98258023cc3f2cf5c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4a6cb46c145d4ca49a82eae93af979b0"><span data-offset-key="4a6cb46c145d4ca49a82eae93af979b0:0">Node.js</span></span></span></a><span key="88467afa5da5433a9f4064bc2572195c"><span offset-key="88467afa5da5433a9f4064bc2572195c:0"> v8 or above.</span></span>

<span key="0f2c1058c71c40968c35f07a1d8fc3c6"><span offset-key="0f2c1058c71c40968c35f07a1d8fc3c6:0">The official guide also assumes that you have intermediate knowledge about HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and React. If you are just starting to learn front-end or React, it may not be the best idea to use the UI framework as your first step.</span></span>

<span key="3fe1bd8715ef448d9457a80b59db13bd"><span offset-key="3fe1bd8715ef448d9457a80b59db13bd:0">Finally, if you are working in a local development environment, please refer to </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Install-and-Initialization" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="202a60e566064a80afc2dfb230b072a4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="8e0458b6ab2144b9abf9a6a09499fb54"><span data-offset-key="8e0458b6ab2144b9abf9a6a09499fb54:0">Install and Initialization</span></span></span></a><span key="e9d87ab4e24e4c06b35c2f54cacc3aca"><span offset-key="e9d87ab4e24e4c06b35c2f54cacc3aca:0"> section of "Use in create-react-app".</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="f4c00bce87864c91ac89332a64c289e3"><span offset-key="f4c00bce87864c91ac89332a64c289e3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Your-First-Example" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="42d7ef099e364c62ac3807aa9b1e60ca" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4976e22bf7264246aa4659776e9a1893"><span data-offset-key="4976e22bf7264246aa4659776e9a1893:0">Your First Example</span></span></span></a><span key="837c4cf0e114424a964729eb056412e0"><span offset-key="837c4cf0e114424a964729eb056412e0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="38b49ab52aa14222b93e555a2bc0aad1"><span offset-key="38b49ab52aa14222b93e555a2bc0aad1:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Test-with-Jest" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="013dbcc21d0c43969501598e448dfada" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="88e8da29a9b24213916563fd25e8265a"><span data-offset-key="88e8da29a9b24213916563fd25e8265a:0">Test with Jest</span></span></span></a><span key="3a21d0cbddc742e19e2c55eb1f4c1cad"><span offset-key="3a21d0cbddc742e19e2c55eb1f4c1cad:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="baf33341e7484995b52080179c383a79"><span offset-key="baf33341e7484995b52080179c383a79:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Import-on-Demand" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ae298ff603804b1eafed74552bd369d3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d1429161cdb84f5cab6fefc9b064e8ec"><span data-offset-key="d1429161cdb84f5cab6fefc9b064e8ec:0">Import on Demand</span></span></span></a><span key="22641996a7c048df82a9b9d10da461b9"><span offset-key="22641996a7c048df82a9b9d10da461b9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

    <span key="8a43dc41367e477e95b681b10f305a7d"><span offset-key="8a43dc41367e477e95b681b10f305a7d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Customize-your-Workflow" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="db5fe4c3f51b444289c8ab3f3f5329ee" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="04a8666b18474f20b6a785a38660a87a"><span data-offset-key="04a8666b18474f20b6a785a38660a87a:0">Customize your Workflow</span></span></span></a><span key="2314e5d5e4f7448686b9a64a9c5895bd"><span offset-key="2314e5d5e4f7448686b9a64a9c5895bd:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="5b67dbd2d4244220a5e16e62a523e6e6"><span offset-key="5b67dbd2d4244220a5e16e62a523e6e6:0">Your First Example</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Your-First-Example" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d20e00c365e746d5a247000a1ac6e650" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ce459e5179934c6eb99b485734d36b22"><span data-offset-key="ce459e5179934c6eb99b485734d36b22:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="f3f89da7902547d1b81b5c4919194b21"><span offset-key="f3f89da7902547d1b81b5c4919194b21:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="0b398e11272942c8afe3c375717f40a5"><span offset-key="0b398e11272942c8afe3c375717f40a5:0">Here is a simple online codesandbox demo of an Ant Design component to show the usage of Ant Design React.</span></span>

<span key="44cb6c2efe074671860ee5bcda293ef7"><span offset-key="44cb6c2efe074671860ee5bcda293ef7:0">Follow the steps below to play around with Ant Design yourself:</span></span>

### 

<span key="57f67100564f4eddb88efef2a2993649"><span offset-key="57f67100564f4eddb88efef2a2993649:0">1. Create a codesandbox</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#1.-Create-a-codesandbox" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5a8f33d7be544894aadafc1040513112" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="574cd9ff216e464095422afec845a4e0"><span data-offset-key="574cd9ff216e464095422afec845a4e0:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="831dfd5072d34e799730f619850b6aa4"><span offset-key="831dfd5072d34e799730f619850b6aa4:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="9fd989196324462a97d7b85bb566d9c8"><span offset-key="9fd989196324462a97d7b85bb566d9c8:0">Visit </span></span><a href="http://u.ant.design/codesandbox-repro" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bc9dd7aaf07544a588e3f0fef4efda03" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e824551eb7f242adbe8431c365e46e0e"><span data-offset-key="e824551eb7f242adbe8431c365e46e0e:0">http://u.ant.design/codesandbox-repro</span></span></span></a><span key="d1df18b2bf7c4fcabbf1921d189ddf24"><span offset-key="d1df18b2bf7c4fcabbf1921d189ddf24:0"> to create a codesandbox -- don't forget to press the save button as well to create a new instance.</span></span>

### 

<span key="9ba707adb6f04e0bad1064c9695d8d9f"><span offset-key="9ba707adb6f04e0bad1064c9695d8d9f:0">2. Use and modify an antd component</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#2.-Use-and-modify-an-antd-component" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9aebaa9acc9a4c25a7d8ebe73b240b09" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e739a25daf174de7b7b1a8e181719593"><span data-offset-key="e739a25daf174de7b7b1a8e181719593:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="80f6000f70314294968a165b46577479"><span offset-key="80f6000f70314294968a165b46577479:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="ca554b9ad0114f348e61a7949cc9e832"><span offset-key="ca554b9ad0114f348e61a7949cc9e832:0">Replace the contents of </span>`index.js`<span offset-key="ca554b9ad0114f348e61a7949cc9e832:2"> with the following code. As you can see, there is no difference between antd's components and typical React components.</span></span>

<span key="caef6b735a7a49748c5d4f666d073e8e"><span offset-key="caef6b735a7a49748c5d4f666d073e8e:0">If you have already set things up by following the </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Install-and-Initialization" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="deb14b4b82a64f8fb616a29222089792" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="39e2f73796f3405e8f53f48cfa8c9ed1"><span data-offset-key="39e2f73796f3405e8f53f48cfa8c9ed1:0">Install and Initialization</span></span></span></a><span key="d752739fb72a457bab76cdf8a4c477b5"><span offset-key="d752739fb72a457bab76cdf8a4c477b5:0"> section of "Use in create-react-app", replace the content of </span>`/src/index.js`<span offset-key="d752739fb72a457bab76cdf8a4c477b5:2"> as follows:</span></span>

1

<span key="1bdb17d28ba5476a8d263023f4175650"><span offset-key="1bdb17d28ba5476a8d263023f4175650:0">import React, { useState } from 'react';</span></span>

2

<span key="99ce814c5faa4d568358c3ab42c99dc4"><span offset-key="99ce814c5faa4d568358c3ab42c99dc4:0">import { render } from 'react-dom';</span></span>

3

<span key="95d98dae7e074c90b050bef20c13bdcc"><span offset-key="95d98dae7e074c90b050bef20c13bdcc:0">import { DatePicker, message } from 'antd';</span></span>

4

<span key="9db9c0d9af774fadadaa49c5af82c582"><span offset-key="9db9c0d9af774fadadaa49c5af82c582:0">import 'antd/dist/antd.css';</span></span>

5

<span key="978f6c4cab994c4ab40bcf1ee0e233cd"><span offset-key="978f6c4cab994c4ab40bcf1ee0e233cd:0">import './index.css';</span></span>

6

<span key="cc726b652a564e5eb7fea5d847c7253d"><span offset-key="cc726b652a564e5eb7fea5d847c7253d:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

7

<span key="c0cea72a414f4e6fb2f29f93d83d07b5"><span offset-key="c0cea72a414f4e6fb2f29f93d83d07b5:0">const App = () => {</span></span>

8

<span key="df871717260644eea70c09081710de1e"><span offset-key="df871717260644eea70c09081710de1e:0"> const \[date, setDate\] = useState(null);</span></span>

9

<span key="5ce140f6bd5e4a4896a90634951728c0"><span offset-key="5ce140f6bd5e4a4896a90634951728c0:0"> const handleChange = value => {</span></span>

10

<span key="cfca51d81bc7465fa0f38a98e2a6d312"><span offset-key="cfca51d81bc7465fa0f38a98e2a6d312:0"> message.info(\`Selected Date: ${value ? value.format('YYYY-MM-DD') : 'None'}\`);</span></span>

11

<span key="4d6a01b469c448ceb07a3d6ddce0c3c5"><span offset-key="4d6a01b469c448ceb07a3d6ddce0c3c5:0"> setDate(value);</span></span>

12

<span key="17a0699756344389acc32b0466516f94"><span offset-key="17a0699756344389acc32b0466516f94:0"> };</span></span>

13

<span key="f6a30e90a4c24c48a2a8e77840568cd4"><span offset-key="f6a30e90a4c24c48a2a8e77840568cd4:0"> return (</span></span>

14

<span key="c3c78267e64f4d1a9a78fbcf90157693"><span offset-key="c3c78267e64f4d1a9a78fbcf90157693:0"> &lt;div style={{ width: 400, margin: '100px auto' }}></span></span>

15

<span key="7d3cf295313b422289e3d4503024d65b"><span offset-key="7d3cf295313b422289e3d4503024d65b:0"> &lt;DatePicker onChange={handleChange} /></span></span>

16

<span key="c1e7aed411f24f23b213ce88be981dd9"><span offset-key="c1e7aed411f24f23b213ce88be981dd9:0"> &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 16 }}></span></span>

17

<span key="81cd3c86b4ad47d6915a4872b8d782a2"><span offset-key="81cd3c86b4ad47d6915a4872b8d782a2:0"> Selected Date: {date ? date.format('YYYY-MM-DD') : 'None'}</span></span>

18

<span key="a0a4c8ef17cc495fbf20b853fe05c44f"><span offset-key="a0a4c8ef17cc495fbf20b853fe05c44f:0"> &lt;/div></span></span>

19

<span key="1b33517c0edb4e7b87805eb95ead6c06"><span offset-key="1b33517c0edb4e7b87805eb95ead6c06:0"> &lt;/div></span></span>

20

<span key="f9243f47b6f3484b999ea3d7e247576c"><span offset-key="f9243f47b6f3484b999ea3d7e247576c:0"> );</span></span>

21

<span key="6895bcedb9df47c9a205cdd19266f211"><span offset-key="6895bcedb9df47c9a205cdd19266f211:0">};</span></span>

22

<span key="2b97ff96d04242e1899fd746f2206782"><span offset-key="2b97ff96d04242e1899fd746f2206782:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

23

<span key="2ea5e5ce95f6480282c54f56cd9a7958"><span offset-key="2ea5e5ce95f6480282c54f56cd9a7958:0">render(&lt;App />, document.getElementById('root'));</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="ac2a4c3e93df42489ee318b7e5bc8655"><span offset-key="ac2a4c3e93df42489ee318b7e5bc8655:0">3. Explore more components</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#3.-Explore-more-components" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bb5a3de49ccd43a98fbc83a3eb86bdd0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="23369edd1c8646bdabd686cf4c68d784"><span data-offset-key="23369edd1c8646bdabd686cf4c68d784:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="b0cecbd25e114b9b95c5e42b567a25b4"><span offset-key="b0cecbd25e114b9b95c5e42b567a25b4:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a68ec80039a747a08c571c831cfc074c"><span offset-key="a68ec80039a747a08c571c831cfc074c:0">You can view the list of components in the side menu of the Components page, such as the </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/components/alert/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="71d5f4e0a79b45dd9829a348b71065db" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="1c8cf3889cfa46bf9fbf1bf46628df3d"><span data-offset-key="1c8cf3889cfa46bf9fbf1bf46628df3d:0">Alert</span></span></span></a><span key="c69eeb40ee8c4e50901a596af073f6e7"><span offset-key="c69eeb40ee8c4e50901a596af073f6e7:0"> component. Plenty of examples are also provided in the component pages and API documentation as well.</span></span>

<span key="188a67bd1f1945e7b8e04e150282b1be"><span offset-key="188a67bd1f1945e7b8e04e150282b1be:0">Click the "Open in Editor" icon in the first example to open an editor with source code to use out-of-the-box. Now you can import the </span>`Alert`<span offset-key="188a67bd1f1945e7b8e04e150282b1be:2"> component into the codesandbox:</span></span>

1

<span key="eda4ede3498f44478e3a97a5d2183d9b"><span offset-key="eda4ede3498f44478e3a97a5d2183d9b:0">- import { DatePicker, message } from 'antd';</span></span>

2

<span key="788dbf13758c4b8bb83b228f6a0c37f0"><span offset-key="788dbf13758c4b8bb83b228f6a0c37f0:0">+ import { DatePicker, message, Alert } from 'antd';</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="968d1b642f75429c9a156b0633fa4d3e"><span offset-key="968d1b642f75429c9a156b0633fa4d3e:0">Now add the following jsx inside the </span>`render`<span offset-key="968d1b642f75429c9a156b0633fa4d3e:2"> function.</span></span>

1

<span key="d92144e800f64ce1a918f047042027b7"><span offset-key="d92144e800f64ce1a918f047042027b7:0"> &lt;DatePicker onChange={value => this.handleChange(value)} /></span></span>

2

<span key="c8f328da1f15462eab9eb914f4f04a43"><span offset-key="c8f328da1f15462eab9eb914f4f04a43:0"> &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 20 }}></span></span>

3

<span key="0105576b3d8847d6a9914f355c7ca227"><span offset-key="0105576b3d8847d6a9914f355c7ca227:0">- Selected Date: {date ? date.format('YYYY-MM-DD') : 'None'}</span></span>

4

<span key="262fd353120b4357b92f4181f85430d8"><span offset-key="262fd353120b4357b92f4181f85430d8:0">+ &lt;Alert message="Selected Date" description={date ? date.format('YYYY-MM-DD') : 'None'} /></span></span>

5

<span key="0f689ed4b2d54415b4db5fe64edbb76e"><span offset-key="0f689ed4b2d54415b4db5fe64edbb76e:0"> &lt;/div></span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="379bcc61a78c47978e31a747743c823a"><span offset-key="379bcc61a78c47978e31a747743c823a:0">Select a date, and you can see the effect in the preview area on the right:</span></span>

<span key="21dce516b4144fa196da901d2a5eebd5"><span offset-key="21dce516b4144fa196da901d2a5eebd5:0">codesandbox screenshot</span></span>

<span key="87319172999e46668c6183b2e9e8e96c"><span offset-key="87319172999e46668c6183b2e9e8e96c:0">OK! Now that you know the basics of using antd components, you are welcome to explore more components in the codesandbox. When reporting a bug with ant design, we also strongly recommend using codesandbox to provide a reproducible demo as well.</span></span>

### 

<span key="c7fd58ba50e141bab389fb8a46d36800"><span offset-key="c7fd58ba50e141bab389fb8a46d36800:0">4. Next Steps</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#4.-Next-Steps" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="09f89ec82ba04dbab416ea56c47213c3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ddf61027280a468a8f6b716dd46b53dc"><span data-offset-key="ddf61027280a468a8f6b716dd46b53dc:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="e8ba68e25dda4c69977fe82f5431c320"><span offset-key="e8ba68e25dda4c69977fe82f5431c320:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="1951554758fa45cdb5bfa6a01e417d03"><span offset-key="1951554758fa45cdb5bfa6a01e417d03:0">During actual real-world project development, you will most likely need a development workflow consisting of </span>`compile/build/deploy/lint/debug/`<span offset-key="1951554758fa45cdb5bfa6a01e417d03:2"> deployment. You can read the following documents on the subject or use the following scaffolds and examples provided below:</span></span>

## 

<span key="10a80a42ad7547129cc214a9f9be102c"><span offset-key="10a80a42ad7547129cc214a9f9be102c:0">Test with Jest</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Test-with-Jest" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="395575a65b074facbd63d5841b325ec0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="2e75aeebc64f4feba235e1c172735a03"><span data-offset-key="2e75aeebc64f4feba235e1c172735a03:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="21a2876a55254c74a6edce8b0be72446"><span offset-key="21a2876a55254c74a6edce8b0be72446:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="fac4cf0a3ed34935968064379a274a85"><span offset-key="fac4cf0a3ed34935968064379a274a85:0">If you use </span>`create-react-app`<span offset-key="fac4cf0a3ed34935968064379a274a85:2"> follow the instructions </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Test-with-Jest" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d204eb7efafe4ff3aa33b1e5f18c4616" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c4d7563f31914077bc70012c42f64af1"><span data-offset-key="c4d7563f31914077bc70012c42f64af1:0">here</span></span></span></a><span key="238cb83390654b4cb0bd0df0de187ecd"><span offset-key="238cb83390654b4cb0bd0df0de187ecd:0"> instead.</span></span>

<span key="16e4e04ea20f4f35b57d0f4d6cb65ad3"><span offset-key="16e4e04ea20f4f35b57d0f4d6cb65ad3:0">Jest does not support </span>`esm`<span offset-key="16e4e04ea20f4f35b57d0f4d6cb65ad3:2"> modules, and Ant Design uses them. In order to test your Ant Design application with Jest you have to add the following to your Jest config :</span></span>

1

<span key="095d81d7ed674f3ebc2ae5f31da3d291"><span offset-key="095d81d7ed674f3ebc2ae5f31da3d291:0">"transform": { "^.+\\\\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)?quot;: "ts-jest" }</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="23fd1bcec99d45e5a094bca76ffc1fe0"><span offset-key="23fd1bcec99d45e5a094bca76ffc1fe0:0">Import on Demand</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Import-on-Demand" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c10309ddc98a44b39e3aae1412e49b1b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e536fe71a3564e5096c4c30ea7f8f6ee"><span data-offset-key="e536fe71a3564e5096c4c30ea7f8f6ee:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="d5e236c1cdcc477da2c60354c72e481a"><span offset-key="d5e236c1cdcc477da2c60354c72e481a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="6af15c1004e5483180e3860dc7b8ca27">`antd`<span offset-key="6af15c1004e5483180e3860dc7b8ca27:1"> supports tree shaking of ES modules, so using </span>`import { Button } from 'antd';`<span offset-key="6af15c1004e5483180e3860dc7b8ca27:3"> would drop js code you didn't use.</span></span>

<span key="c191ca34d2074448984e137ef9380855"><span offset-key="c191ca34d2074448984e137ef9380855:0">If you see logs like in the screenshot below, you might still be using </span>`[email protected]`<span offset-key="c191ca34d2074448984e137ef9380855:2"> or have a wrong webpack config which can't support tree shaking.</span></span>

1

<span key="3e07e6a8d1224976a9f944b5af31da5d"><span offset-key="3e07e6a8d1224976a9f944b5af31da5d:0">You are using a whole package of antd, please use https://www.npmjs.com/package/babel-plugin-import to reduce app bundle size. Please upgrade webpack or check the config.</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="313e65fdbdb6414c9faa922ef7ac8e0a"><span offset-key="313e65fdbdb6414c9faa922ef7ac8e0a:0">Customize your Workflow</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/getting-started#Customize-your-Workflow" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="980ab7536dea407996b720ba3d32064e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="dfd59c3866cc49f394601f3678cd82f4"><span data-offset-key="dfd59c3866cc49f394601f3678cd82f4:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="825f53074a4048ba82ddd1dab3c954a4"><span offset-key="825f53074a4048ba82ddd1dab3c954a4:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="65e156c6ec134decbb5842fe90740090"><span offset-key="65e156c6ec134decbb5842fe90740090:0">If you want to customize your workflow, we recommend using </span></span><a href="http://webpack.github.io" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="550d942ccb7a4536a69d0ab170873011" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4a3f965f7531436485b5e6c6354c86be"><span data-offset-key="4a3f965f7531436485b5e6c6354c86be:0">webpack</span></span></span></a><span key="052486950d0c4a88b8c2ee55b5c3ee2b"><span offset-key="052486950d0c4a88b8c2ee55b5c3ee2b:0"> to build and debug code. You can try out plenty of </span></span><a href="https://github.com/enaqx/awesome-react#react-tools" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8dbc717e327345cabbebeb20b12bc140" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d3f8344a31c546ceb8158e68dafef1be"><span data-offset-key="d3f8344a31c546ceb8158e68dafef1be:0">boilerplates</span></span></span></a><span key="8e2c81a90261466fbf4370ead928c3a5"><span offset-key="8e2c81a90261466fbf4370ead928c3a5:0"> available in the React ecosystem.</span></span>

<span key="efd8704411c342d39d78325fc3d43c9a"><span offset-key="efd8704411c342d39d78325fc3d43c9a:0">There are also some </span></span><a href="http://scaffold.ant.design" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="af0775add4064a9fb4452bec6d799f6a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="28cde34165f540b6bbb572e0a112af9d"><span data-offset-key="28cde34165f540b6bbb572e0a112af9d:0">scaffolds</span></span></span></a><span key="891adb2868d544f99c3babe1d8d0c3ed"><span offset-key="891adb2868d544f99c3babe1d8d0c3ed:0"> which have already been integrated into antd, so you can try and start with one of these and even contribute.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="76838e273bcb49f89f3c039b1e407270"><span offset-key="76838e273bcb49f89f3c039b1e407270:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/practical-projects#What&#39;s-Next" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b8cea69725aa40138e8257930ca9356b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d7de2e01c45449cbb4f357b577ca4995"><span data-offset-key="d7de2e01c45449cbb4f357b577ca4995:0">What's Next</span></span></span></a><span key="9a16ee2f007e426bb237d56a5fdc0be4"><span offset-key="9a16ee2f007e426bb237d56a5fdc0be4:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="16676f53fa74470583cc0b0e26be9e17"><span offset-key="16676f53fa74470583cc0b0e26be9e17:0">In real project development, you may need data flow solutions such as Redux or MobX. Ant Design React is a UI library that can be used with data flow solutions and application frameworks in any React ecosystem. Based on the business scenario, we launched a pluggable enterprise-level application framework umi, which is recommended for use in the project.</span></span>

<span key="8d54a24194ba40a2a6ff306a77e09b0a"><span offset-key="8d54a24194ba40a2a6ff306a77e09b0a:0">And </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2386b2cfbed54e9a99452ad0b2d15f4f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="79b8d8143626439f90915f995c364ebd"><span data-offset-key="79b8d8143626439f90915f995c364ebd:0">umi</span></span></span></a><span key="8c529ace46fa4b718ae8a2d0ba28df1a"><span offset-key="8c529ace46fa4b718ae8a2d0ba28df1a:0"> is a routing-based framework that supports </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org/docs/convention-routing" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0e5f1b0bf71c4c16b3f2d733b31ffb74" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d2c2f648c03f4f8ba118aa10f5580dca"><span data-offset-key="d2c2f648c03f4f8ba118aa10f5580dca:0">next.js-like conventional routing</span></span></span></a><span key="90c25e6fa96c4ce2b9e7aa7ef0fb746b"><span offset-key="90c25e6fa96c4ce2b9e7aa7ef0fb746b:0"> and various advanced routing functions, such as </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org/config#dynamicimport" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1fdb21dcba0744c6bb95d8a37d1016ba" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4253d75c22f541bb9f204aeab1d94c8c"><span data-offset-key="4253d75c22f541bb9f204aeab1d94c8c:0">routing-level on-demand loading</span></span></span></a><span key="6464a32603cb4d399267b572b8b954f4"><span offset-key="6464a32603cb4d399267b572b8b954f4:0">. With a complete </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org/plugins/api" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="64d094442bdb41bf929a17cd769404cc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="937495e6e1ad449cb2814175e5ab2c6d"><span data-offset-key="937495e6e1ad449cb2814175e5ab2c6d:0">plugin system</span></span></span></a><span key="71eda5eeab874b5f84e604616f226d80"><span offset-key="71eda5eeab874b5f84e604616f226d80:0"> that covers every life cycle from source code to build product, umi is able to support various functional extensions and business needs; meanwhile </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org/docs/use-umi-ui" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="304afcc4f4724265b13a66448d4539f1" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f4579b2e2a8f4debb07708e1a3b495a7"><span data-offset-key="f4579b2e2a8f4debb07708e1a3b495a7:0">Umi UI</span></span></span></a><span key="21613a1d0c7d4c65a0ca46f401ab5715"><span offset-key="21613a1d0c7d4c65a0ca46f401ab5715:0"> is provided to enhance the development experience and development efficiency through Visual Aided Programming (VAP).</span></span>

> <span key="63edcd6219e743438989ad12d318b765"><span offset-key="63edcd6219e743438989ad12d318b765:0">You may also be interested in </span></span><a href="https://pro.ant.design" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="29d0baa18ade48dc9526b5cb9b86dcf2" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f1de642a2396453a9565162772e9e1d1"><span data-offset-key="f1de642a2396453a9565162772e9e1d1:0">Ant Design Pro</span></span></span></a><span key="b174b48780f54ebcb814bfa85b8f544c"><span offset-key="b174b48780f54ebcb814bfa85b8f544c:0">, an Out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications based on umi, dva and ant design.</span></span>

<span key="97dde73feede46a5902e2a69d0f6c4f5"><span offset-key="97dde73feede46a5902e2a69d0f6c4f5:0">This article will guide you to create a simple application from zero using Umi, dva and antd.</span></span>

<span key="f6c4966ad4f240f0aedd90f662962b34"><span offset-key="f6c4966ad4f240f0aedd90f662962b34:0">As your application grows and you notice you are sharing UI elements between multiple pages (or using them multiple times on the same page), in umi it's called reusable components.</span></span>

## 

<span key="1bfb6749681b477c80df9b16134d61de"><span offset-key="1bfb6749681b477c80df9b16134d61de:0">Simple data management solution</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/practical-projects#Simple-data-management-solution" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="157ae8ce74614b6b8fd2fee7cbf198fd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="3d308ad4edd443c2ba1ff300b31fdf70"><span data-offset-key="3d308ad4edd443c2ba1ff300b31fdf70:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="ab4ea0a0e7e342d384b64f53889713fc"><span offset-key="ab4ea0a0e7e342d384b64f53889713fc:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="473dee5baf254f0083009ece28993ee4">`@umijs/plugin-model`<span offset-key="473dee5baf254f0083009ece28993ee4:1"> is a simple data flow scheme based on the hooks paradigm, which can replace dva to perform global data flow in the middle stage under certain circumstances. We agree that the files in the </span>`src/models`<span offset-key="473dee5baf254f0083009ece28993ee4:3"> directory are the model files defined by the project. Each file needs to export a function by default, the function defines a hook, and files that do not meet the specifications will be filtered out.</span></span>

<span key="d9bd483e2aaa4710a8b21184c56534a1"><span offset-key="d9bd483e2aaa4710a8b21184c56534a1:0">The file name corresponds to the name of the final model, and you can consume the data in the model through the API provided by the plug-in.</span></span>

<span key="1c4f2ae269bf45f299b3016635d6c77a"><span offset-key="1c4f2ae269bf45f299b3016635d6c77a:0">Let's take a simple table as an example. First you need to create a new file </span>`src/models/useProductList.ts`<span offset-key="1c4f2ae269bf45f299b3016635d6c77a:2">.</span></span>

1

<span key="22159a7fe0bf4d34bc11e5bc4665fe74"><span offset-key="22159a7fe0bf4d34bc11e5bc4665fe74:0">import { useRequest } from 'umi';</span></span>

2

<span key="f5648eb46fb34a609e2f72081a3df275"><span offset-key="f5648eb46fb34a609e2f72081a3df275:0">import { queryProductList } from '@/services/product';</span></span>

3

<span key="79e77dd7863349698722595140ec8141"><span offset-key="79e77dd7863349698722595140ec8141:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

4

<span key="a0c54d3f207340b4ac1d16eb3a94411e"><span offset-key="a0c54d3f207340b4ac1d16eb3a94411e:0">export default function useProductList(params: { pageSize: number; current: number }) {</span></span>

5

## 

<span key="06fb0f8b9f384772b67dcc4c6d62ff76"><span offset-key="06fb0f8b9f384772b67dcc4c6d62ff76:0">ProLayout</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/practical-projects#ProLayout" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="689ac7135afe49c6b01cc91b3d95f457" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4a8945407d1449ce95ca78f20cbdc845"><span data-offset-key="4a8945407d1449ce95ca78f20cbdc845:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="c26c2a989acf4d77bce30d448be41f96"><span offset-key="c26c2a989acf4d77bce30d448be41f96:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="eeef3867e0a64b2da55c45f8ecbad0cd"><span offset-key="eeef3867e0a64b2da55c45f8ecbad0cd:0">A standard mid-to-back page generally requires a layout. This layout is often highly similar. ProLayout encapsulates commonly used menus, breadcrumbs, page headers and other functions, provides an independent framework and works out of the box Advanced layout components.</span></span>

<span key="442d52a17027411db26416b15be2392f"><span offset-key="442d52a17027411db26416b15be2392f:0">And supports three modes of </span>`side`<span offset-key="442d52a17027411db26416b15be2392f:2">, </span>`mix`<span offset-key="442d52a17027411db26416b15be2392f:4">, and </span>`top`<span offset-key="442d52a17027411db26416b15be2392f:6">, and it also has built-in menu selection, the menu generates breadcrumbs, and automatically sets the logic of the page title. Can help you start a project quickly.</span></span>

<span key="942ac1464cc54e99a53879fe70de9b20"><span offset-key="942ac1464cc54e99a53879fe70de9b20:0">site</span></span>

<span key="58937dc532254d228fccd85c421e3f57"><span offset-key="58937dc532254d228fccd85c421e3f57:0"> );</span></span>

44

<span key="10ddb16584a54cb1ad68f9c34d4d1aa6"><span offset-key="10ddb16584a54cb1ad68f9c34d4d1aa6:0">};</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="53ee974106d64c4dac100c70df2acc5c"><span offset-key="53ee974106d64c4dac100c70df2acc5c:0">ProTable provides preset logic to handle loading, pagination and search forms, which can greatly reduce the amount of code, click here </span></span><a href="https://protable.ant.design/getting-started" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1615556dbae74936adf8a0efc7b4e491" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4f5d9a293e5b4bc0a577d753843ba871"><span data-offset-key="4f5d9a293e5b4bc0a577d753843ba871:0">Quick Start</span></span></span></a><span key="18d87a55c9c048ad80ea47c2dd2dddf8"><span offset-key="18d87a55c9c048ad80ea47c2dd2dddf8:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="9518ec4636034029a0cade14ab4e5f49"><span offset-key="9518ec4636034029a0cade14ab4e5f49:0">Build</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/practical-projects#Build" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1f6eb35e036d4b1ca8dfdd077b65388a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c4e7d190a3e14ed1920ff8b902825aa1"><span data-offset-key="c4e7d190a3e14ed1920ff8b902825aa1:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="eabbc635cd904533bdcc29dcfce2014a"><span offset-key="eabbc635cd904533bdcc29dcfce2014a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="dcde91cfbdee411e8013a345e015b3a4"><span offset-key="dcde91cfbdee411e8013a345e015b3a4:0">Now that we've written our application and verified that it works in development, it's time to get it ready for deployment to our users. To do so, execute the following command:</span></span>

1

<span key="0689620bcb0a444084a0975cb229be6e"><span offset-key="0689620bcb0a444084a0975cb229be6e:0">$ yarn build</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="7ac3c333a76142a9b62d55fe9fa7be95"><span offset-key="7ac3c333a76142a9b62d55fe9fa7be95:0">The </span>`build`<span offset-key="7ac3c333a76142a9b62d55fe9fa7be95:2"> command packages up all of the assets that make up your application —— JavaScript, templates, CSS, web fonts, images, and more. Then you can find these files in the </span>`dist/`<span offset-key="7ac3c333a76142a9b62d55fe9fa7be95:4"> directory.</span></span>

# 

<span key="1fee136eed6742d286f59399f6ad16d2"><span offset-key="1fee136eed6742d286f59399f6ad16d2:0">Use in create-react-app</span></span>

<span key="4fcd72eb81fe4ef09dd5698749c6fe07"><span offset-key="4fcd72eb81fe4ef09dd5698749c6fe07:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a057221c9a924ea99500c8386cbe6524" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d6b849e7f07e42d9b344b228649713c3"><span data-offset-key="d6b849e7f07e42d9b344b228649713c3:0">create-react-app</span></span></span></a><span key="b32183229ca64492ac31ac707221ba0e"><span offset-key="b32183229ca64492ac31ac707221ba0e:0"> is one of the best React application development tools. We are going to use </span>`antd`<span offset-key="b32183229ca64492ac31ac707221ba0e:2"> within it and modify the webpack config for some customized needs.</span></span>

## 

<span key="37f236795f784b68bc74a7fe89c39ed6"><span offset-key="37f236795f784b68bc74a7fe89c39ed6:0">Install and Initialization</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Install-and-Initialization" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e1a86ddf9f474e5eb43c5f4a4ce61b88" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e1947947b4fc41009d2a843456ef669e"><span data-offset-key="e1947947b4fc41009d2a843456ef669e:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="8f6b49301388428f852f39f4dc0bcd52"><span offset-key="8f6b49301388428f852f39f4dc0bcd52:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="03cfcbe4696e45ae96f05f38f231e302"><span offset-key="03cfcbe4696e45ae96f05f38f231e302:0">Before all start, you may need install </span></span><a href="https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c567ed013148482ea7bfb4dc3c4da693" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="7737b82d7f8a41989ef18fdec9daf2bb"><span data-offset-key="7737b82d7f8a41989ef18fdec9daf2bb:0">yarn</span></span></span></a><span key="03cdabbe99574b1a85462abbce249137"><span offset-key="03cdabbe99574b1a85462abbce249137:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="66e35aa70cc941d79735af6a3c52484e"><span offset-key="66e35aa70cc941d79735af6a3c52484e:0">$ yarn create react-app antd-demo</span></span>

2

<span key="cae629f48bb948cdb3c4a8cc659c6e99"><span offset-key="cae629f48bb948cdb3c4a8cc659c6e99:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

3

<span key="547b13c0fc024cae96f6b15cf9473322"><span offset-key="547b13c0fc024cae96f6b15cf9473322:0"># or</span></span>

4

<span key="d790bb444d2a4959884ba356b2db7520"><span offset-key="d790bb444d2a4959884ba356b2db7520:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

5

<span key="b681dcad6eb542ee94961a579d623963"><span offset-key="b681dcad6eb542ee94961a579d623963:0">$ npx create-react-app antd-demo</span></span>

## 

<span key="eb179092a76f40598cbc1eaff4f70ef8"><span offset-key="eb179092a76f40598cbc1eaff4f70ef8:0">Test with Jest</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Test-with-Jest" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4fb7106460484073a1fc630ee41fdd99" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="5fd55437da7246bbb32b5876240fa9ae"><span data-offset-key="5fd55437da7246bbb32b5876240fa9ae:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="84463f6fd4a444a1955fc5339d699d53"><span offset-key="84463f6fd4a444a1955fc5339d699d53:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="71048946a8da4272ac338ae84add1cbe">`create-react-app`<span offset-key="71048946a8da4272ac338ae84add1cbe:1"> comes with </span>`jest`<span offset-key="71048946a8da4272ac338ae84add1cbe:3"> built in. Jest does not support </span>`esm`<span offset-key="71048946a8da4272ac338ae84add1cbe:5"> modules, and Ant Design uses them. In order to test your Ant Design application with Jest you have to add the following to your </span>`package.json`<span offset-key="71048946a8da4272ac338ae84add1cbe:7"> :</span></span>

1

<span key="902984f3699b40adaf01d8ed07d1a753"><span offset-key="902984f3699b40adaf01d8ed07d1a753:0">"jest": {</span></span>

2

<span key="ccdd7f8239cb4e168c546a8f08691c4d"><span offset-key="ccdd7f8239cb4e168c546a8f08691c4d:0"> "transformIgnorePatterns": \[</span></span>

3

<span key="7ea36c163c874efa9fe23190d8f97df3"><span offset-key="7ea36c163c874efa9fe23190d8f97df3:0"> "/node\_modules/(?!antd|@ant-design|rc-.+?|@babel/runtime).+(js|jsx)quot;</span></span>

4

<span key="e553cd635811438b81b0c03410f4fc12"><span offset-key="e553cd635811438b81b0c03410f4fc12:0"> \]</span></span>

5

<span key="495bd1cfd5e84318afe9fca7d91b87c6"><span offset-key="495bd1cfd5e84318afe9fca7d91b87c6:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="0d83c04adf2b4e41862214f6483f65ef"><span offset-key="0d83c04adf2b4e41862214f6483f65ef:0">Advanced Guides</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Advanced-Guides" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c17037a268314f4d9254ae3eb44df659" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b9cc48f081504993bb3f9cf9b6082da0"><span data-offset-key="b9cc48f081504993bb3f9cf9b6082da0:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="b62df2b01dfa43e8a7e79a68f7a53ffb"><span offset-key="b62df2b01dfa43e8a7e79a68f7a53ffb:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="3d0e67ec477a4fd0ac517291a31fa581"><span offset-key="3d0e67ec477a4fd0ac517291a31fa581:0">In the real world, we usually have to modify default webpack config for custom needs such as themes. We can achieve that by using </span></span><a href="https://github.com/gsoft-inc/craco" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f878ebf8330342139c2219fee03750f8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="46ce32a9c2a14f18ae50bfa9fbd454f5"><span data-offset-key="46ce32a9c2a14f18ae50bfa9fbd454f5:0">craco</span></span></span></a><span key="b80833a73e1f43b3a8bab434eaeca527"><span offset-key="b80833a73e1f43b3a8bab434eaeca527:0"> which is one of create-react-app's custom config solutions.</span></span>

<span key="ca5aa447729c4b46a0c3c8439aa21c42"><span offset-key="ca5aa447729c4b46a0c3c8439aa21c42:0">Install craco and modify the </span>`scripts`<span offset-key="ca5aa447729c4b46a0c3c8439aa21c42:2"> field in </span>`package.json`<span offset-key="ca5aa447729c4b46a0c3c8439aa21c42:4">.</span></span>

1

<span key="fee50485473c467f93df2254e2e36eb6"><span offset-key="fee50485473c467f93df2254e2e36eb6:0">$ yarn add @craco/craco</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

1

<span key="c4cb661f5aa44741b5ba3a811609bb29"><span offset-key="c4cb661f5aa44741b5ba3a811609bb29:0">/\* package.json \*/</span></span>

2

<span key="257028464575489badd89dfd0ff41a76"><span offset-key="257028464575489badd89dfd0ff41a76:0">"scripts": {</span></span>

3

<span key="b4fc9aa9337b49738b41a93937fedab0"><span offset-key="b4fc9aa9337b49738b41a93937fedab0:0">- "start": "react-scripts start",</span></span>

4

<span key="dd7be67b335d4cfd916a7d8e797b6f68"><span offset-key="dd7be67b335d4cfd916a7d8e797b6f68:0">- "build": "react-scripts build",</span></span>

5

<span key="27fcb739a51443aa99d5f081d1a32cca"><span offset-key="27fcb739a51443aa99d5f081d1a32cca:0">- "test": "react-scripts test",</span></span>

6

<span key="9cd81e917e0c41708c63db57ead90bd9"><span offset-key="9cd81e917e0c41708c63db57ead90bd9:0">+ "start": "craco start",</span></span>

7

<span key="773823134c0d44c4b37a19877bc53020"><span offset-key="773823134c0d44c4b37a19877bc53020:0">+ "build": "craco build",</span></span>

8

<span key="2ab7a5e55be641cfaa249a317bfffb64"><span offset-key="2ab7a5e55be641cfaa249a317bfffb64:0">+ "test": "craco test",</span></span>

9

<span key="96693f195a9548d591b10f459d45341d"><span offset-key="96693f195a9548d591b10f459d45341d:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="a8262f8b893c4f8a8b7e9b81687d124a"><span offset-key="a8262f8b893c4f8a8b7e9b81687d124a:0">Then create a </span>`craco.config.js`<span offset-key="a8262f8b893c4f8a8b7e9b81687d124a:2"> at root directory of your project for further overriding.</span></span>

1

<span key="0530d0c25912444fade941e7c619a6c4"><span offset-key="0530d0c25912444fade941e7c619a6c4:0">/\* craco.config.js \*/</span></span>

2
