### 

<span key="44962b8213c449e5a6c3fc767c804a5c"><span offset-key="44962b8213c449e5a6c3fc767c804a5c:0">Customize Theme</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Customize-Theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="935fbc6bf642483394fc6392c7f98bbd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="0fd67077886f464d92c3e498268d1e0c"><span data-offset-key="0fd67077886f464d92c3e498268d1e0c:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="6ed445f3c1d34557833c61527d8a644b"><span offset-key="6ed445f3c1d34557833c61527d8a644b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="9e9b08d38e874b65b36d6303914587f2"><span offset-key="9e9b08d38e874b65b36d6303914587f2:0">According to the </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="71b9cb022a29444881213b0486edca1c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="86b06a8f657349e78e35cbc5af618cc4"><span data-offset-key="86b06a8f657349e78e35cbc5af618cc4:0">Customize Theme documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="e0596f952c284a22a6df14bb317e7629"><span offset-key="e0596f952c284a22a6df14bb317e7629:0">, we need to modify less variables via loader like </span></span><a href="https://github.com/webpack/less-loader" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="eacdaac3d91549b4b7fa4701d5c88c45" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="298d5bce99f140708d3ecffdb105ca1d"><span data-offset-key="298d5bce99f140708d3ecffdb105ca1d:0">less-loader</span></span></span></a><span key="1bfdd5518e814cf0a36298b513f5fc2c"><span offset-key="1bfdd5518e814cf0a36298b513f5fc2c:0">. We can use </span></span><a href="https://github.com/DocSpring/craco-less" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e0fe7588c25f47a79f69b16b36a41edf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d35f6f8d5c4a49debacb37f2edc22568"><span data-offset-key="d35f6f8d5c4a49debacb37f2edc22568:0">craco-less</span></span></span></a><span key="8b26e1ebdbe243e2a10cbe1979627d83"><span offset-key="8b26e1ebdbe243e2a10cbe1979627d83:0"> to achieve that,</span></span>

<span key="b1188d8066044105add94dd20c47df91"><span offset-key="b1188d8066044105add94dd20c47df91:0">First we should modify </span>`src/App.css`<span offset-key="b1188d8066044105add94dd20c47df91:2"> to </span>`src/App.less`<span offset-key="b1188d8066044105add94dd20c47df91:4">, then import less file instead.</span></span>

1

<span key="171ca0f84ef045d4af708a0ea9fa63ee"><span offset-key="171ca0f84ef045d4af708a0ea9fa63ee:0">/\* src/App.js \*/</span></span>

2

<span key="a5db61c31c8744ef9877e540c7a127b0"><span offset-key="a5db61c31c8744ef9877e540c7a127b0:0">- import './App.css';</span></span>

3

<span key="6468e175b3f14904b0c1806b29ac8151"><span offset-key="6468e175b3f14904b0c1806b29ac8151:0">+ import './App.less';</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

1

<span key="f4ceef3e2d5b47459311d755a6e30ef4"><span offset-key="f4ceef3e2d5b47459311d755a6e30ef4:0">/\* src/App.less \*/</span></span>

2

<span key="068b25959f3f479ba902542d88ebc95f"><span offset-key="068b25959f3f479ba902542d88ebc95f:0">- @import '~antd/dist/antd.css';</span></span>

3

<span key="50143d8b085842a79ab8d0ecfea09d40"><span offset-key="50143d8b085842a79ab8d0ecfea09d40:0">+ @import '~antd/dist/antd.less';</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="7cde12fad4b14195902bb0d8be4f8221"><span offset-key="7cde12fad4b14195902bb0d8be4f8221:0">Then install </span>`craco-less`<span offset-key="7cde12fad4b14195902bb0d8be4f8221:2"> and modify </span>`craco.config.js`<span offset-key="7cde12fad4b14195902bb0d8be4f8221:4"> like below.</span></span>

1

<span key="07c791fdf1e1464f93c81ad037ed172e"><span offset-key="07c791fdf1e1464f93c81ad037ed172e:0">$ yarn add craco-less</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

1

<span key="4b0ebf1674b8415b9e1936f360455e24"><span offset-key="4b0ebf1674b8415b9e1936f360455e24:0">const CracoLessPlugin = require('craco-less');</span></span>

2

<span key="cbcaa7c1aa864b87b91b045867594f05"><span offset-key="cbcaa7c1aa864b87b91b045867594f05:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

3

<span key="dde1422d2aba4d0f971bdce77cd85c78"><span offset-key="dde1422d2aba4d0f971bdce77cd85c78:0">module.exports = {</span></span>

4

<span key="767a5103909542ea9d1d57169e27e7c2"><span offset-key="767a5103909542ea9d1d57169e27e7c2:0"> plugins: \[</span></span>

5

<span key="cc7fe9327ea94b509aefd0a4a030a213"><span offset-key="cc7fe9327ea94b509aefd0a4a030a213:0"> {</span></span>

6

<span key="afd9e7f6474e4d628a7b89dc44a87ae6"><span offset-key="afd9e7f6474e4d628a7b89dc44a87ae6:0"> plugin: CracoLessPlugin,</span></span>

7

<span key="fdd900c0461a444c91bd6c9774955c18"><span offset-key="fdd900c0461a444c91bd6c9774955c18:0"> options: {</span></span>

8

<span key="f478f0ba3a22411cb283e5d4b391db85"><span offset-key="f478f0ba3a22411cb283e5d4b391db85:0"> lessLoaderOptions: {</span></span>

9

<span key="4760c05512eb40e4a4e3f9e1342eb0b8"><span offset-key="4760c05512eb40e4a4e3f9e1342eb0b8:0"> lessOptions: {</span></span>

10

<span key="51e970a275724eb6962e4d3b02c40e05"><span offset-key="51e970a275724eb6962e4d3b02c40e05:0"> modifyVars: { '@primary-color': '#1DA57A' },</span></span>

11

<span key="9f2c345fb8eb4cd088338a04cdcd016d"><span offset-key="9f2c345fb8eb4cd088338a04cdcd016d:0"> javascriptEnabled: true,</span></span>

<span key="90bf11c6c65949b29e7507671063682d"><span offset-key="90bf11c6c65949b29e7507671063682d:0"> },</span></span>

13

<span key="81725633b6c44c539218fc113f47afd6"><span offset-key="81725633b6c44c539218fc113f47afd6:0"> },</span></span>

<span key="361df8076b9c480fbf6bfc893659a5ee"><span offset-key="361df8076b9c480fbf6bfc893659a5ee:0"> },</span></span>

<span key="31a70e14b7a44953898f34b3f40d2f86"><span offset-key="31a70e14b7a44953898f34b3f40d2f86:0">};</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="5342c51147014aaa868a024e86c967a9"><span offset-key="5342c51147014aaa868a024e86c967a9:0">By adding </span>`modifyVars`<span offset-key="5342c51147014aaa868a024e86c967a9:2"> option of </span></span><a href="https://github.com/webpack/less-loader#less-options" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ffc4e82357a64f3ab8b2df109a521364" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f009e049de1847cbbe42836e36472e12"><span data-offset-key="f009e049de1847cbbe42836e36472e12:0">less-loader</span></span></span></a><span key="3c63c508ccdd410baeafb70add3edf09"><span offset-key="3c63c508ccdd410baeafb70add3edf09:0"> here, we should see a green button rendered on the page after rebooting the server now.</span></span>

<span key="8e23dcfaa3f24142b4866e517d6075a0"><span offset-key="8e23dcfaa3f24142b4866e517d6075a0:0">We provide built-in dark theme and compact theme in antd, you can reference to </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Use-dark-or-compact-theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a25e3369866b471e988de46abf9a9687" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="38d43a824d3d4c4b9d15e90875b76022"><span data-offset-key="38d43a824d3d4c4b9d15e90875b76022:0">Use dark or compact theme</span></span></span></a><span key="281756fce9b14afcae26dc9c393efb03"><span offset-key="281756fce9b14afcae26dc9c393efb03:0">.</span></span>

> <span key="78ebb6a38e9747938bd3ab178ad54024"><span offset-key="78ebb6a38e9747938bd3ab178ad54024:0">You could also try </span></span><a href="https://github.com/timarney/react-app-rewired" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="896aa92c4fdb4f5bbaf6091ab2999671" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="80f6d902514b49a0ac1cd5ae9a21b712"><span data-offset-key="80f6d902514b49a0ac1cd5ae9a21b712:0">react-app-rewired</span></span></span></a><span key="3f78735c8d934ebdb9e4404ad5d63259"><span offset-key="3f78735c8d934ebdb9e4404ad5d63259:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://github.com/arackaf/customize-cra" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="64cda6fe2421422f9d89593b5b2a0101" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="0900616050904d63ae30daecd776229c"><span data-offset-key="0900616050904d63ae30daecd776229c:0">customize-cra</span></span></span></a><span key="e9952151907d4fc9be88d4d9f2057473"><span offset-key="e9952151907d4fc9be88d4d9f2057473:0"> to customize create-react-app webpack config like craco did.</span></span>

## 

<span key="e51c5e347fb2431b9cbdb9de718515e5"><span offset-key="e51c5e347fb2431b9cbdb9de718515e5:0">eject</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#eject" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2f14ebd18e7c4344b463ac6559ba0723" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="958eb6f1cec14deba14b3ee3bd37b7b8"><span data-offset-key="958eb6f1cec14deba14b3ee3bd37b7b8:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="9b6badb4659b4fd399cc04cb215b9dac"><span offset-key="9b6badb4659b4fd399cc04cb215b9dac:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="62644ec72e7a4ce6b77114e9b2b6aa31"><span offset-key="62644ec72e7a4ce6b77114e9b2b6aa31:0">You can also eject your application using </span></span><a href="https://facebook.github.io/create-react-app/docs/available-scripts#npm-run-eject" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="909d6b78ec6543a0b47ac201fa63fee9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="069596b48ab54644a62027d6e72ad223"><span data-offset-key="069596b48ab54644a62027d6e72ad223:0">yarn run eject</span></span></span></a><span key="2747c5d3d12e448fa56e453b3f903b7e"><span offset-key="2747c5d3d12e448fa56e453b3f903b7e:0"> for a custom setup of create-react-app, although you should dig into it by yourself.</span></span>

## 

<span key="b61edea7f00e4cec8d54a9b1cfb496fe"><span offset-key="b61edea7f00e4cec8d54a9b1cfb496fe:0">Summary</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app#Summary" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="07544e43a3e346f7863b67139487e25c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e5382beffbe345149f2870efe18a16cb"><span data-offset-key="e5382beffbe345149f2870efe18a16cb:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="81f9efdf052d4baa988774bb6650a965"><span offset-key="81f9efdf052d4baa988774bb6650a965:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="bfc70b2d87a148768ff18ac241e15949"><span offset-key="bfc70b2d87a148768ff18ac241e15949:0">Finally, we used antd with create-react-app successfully, the source code of this guide was pushed to </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/create-react-app-antd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="cff3e1b7feff43568f94d96496964432" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="bfaad763181945baab04b46346233b94"><span data-offset-key="bfaad763181945baab04b46346233b94:0">create-react-app-antd</span></span></span></a><span key="9da7467fcb474b6d911f4e02d178a74c"><span offset-key="9da7467fcb474b6d911f4e02d178a74c:0"> which you could clone and use it directly.</span></span>

<span key="345a9d79fcba44bba3e93def6a050b08"><span offset-key="345a9d79fcba44bba3e93def6a050b08:0">Next part, We will introduce how to use antd in </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-in-typescript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3af5918884a24a1f95e9918ae751f839" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4f0eb42c356243dd9597ccc6d10a6d25"><span data-offset-key="4f0eb42c356243dd9597ccc6d10a6d25:0">TypeScript</span></span></span></a><span key="0253a32a897b4b4d91fdd73b07dc344f"><span offset-key="0253a32a897b4b4d91fdd73b07dc344f:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/practical-projects" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3ced6eab64d0411aba07b06d9edfcd55" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d72f6eaf1c0543b79b79c8520326db97"><span data-offset-key="d72f6eaf1c0543b79b79c8520326db97:0">Umi</span></span></span></a><span key="794429c3956341f39fac2a67a143e6e5"><span offset-key="794429c3956341f39fac2a67a143e6e5:0">, let's keep moving!</span></span>

## 

<span key="133b36d2062a45dba26c85613dd1bf28"><span offset-key="133b36d2062a45dba26c85613dd1bf28:0">Ant Design Less variables</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Ant-Design-Less-variables" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="688a235a2dc542e380c9914f894fe58d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="9f679614c7284c4fb4e12832ca929107"><span data-offset-key="9f679614c7284c4fb4e12832ca929107:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="5f29f46c48634223a0d6a4492ebf1000"><span offset-key="5f29f46c48634223a0d6a4492ebf1000:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="18234cc47270425f81333f3392275f22"><span offset-key="18234cc47270425f81333f3392275f22:0">We are using </span></span><a href="http://lesscss.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b9754e1f1417467d825eb01fedef98c7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ee56c09be02d406382f434535d166e9f"><span data-offset-key="ee56c09be02d406382f434535d166e9f:0">Less</span></span></span></a><span key="ddea514975e04dadb466c853d85d7a08"><span offset-key="ddea514975e04dadb466c853d85d7a08:0"> as the development language for styling. A set of less variables are defined for each design aspect that can be customized to your needs.</span></span>

<span key="3736fecb648b456cb81efdb5f0c567a9"><span offset-key="3736fecb648b456cb81efdb5f0c567a9:0">There are some major variables below, all less variables could be found in </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/style/themes/default.less" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="73b9d84ce2e24f1197f4b2be34b38086" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="352559ab98084935be84af9550b97e0c"><span data-offset-key="352559ab98084935be84af9550b97e0c:0">Default Variables</span></span></span></a><span key="56661109fd7f49e7a102998bbcd84972"><span offset-key="56661109fd7f49e7a102998bbcd84972:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="34f29920bc4745c6be2172cd78230987"><span offset-key="34f29920bc4745c6be2172cd78230987:0">@primary-color: #1890ff; // primary color for all components</span></span>

2

<span key="0eafd5422f414d2c8aba45642d343ef0"><span offset-key="0eafd5422f414d2c8aba45642d343ef0:0">@link-color: #1890ff; // link color</span></span>

3

<span key="ab61862f8063481ea4ed35b579c31150"><span offset-key="ab61862f8063481ea4ed35b579c31150:0">@success-color: #52c41a; // success state color</span></span>

4

<span key="24b676d2726a4271b6959101665f04cd"><span offset-key="24b676d2726a4271b6959101665f04cd:0">@warning-color: #faad14; // warning state color</span></span>

5

<span key="d5504cfaaebe42d1a17edcd97190dfbb"><span offset-key="d5504cfaaebe42d1a17edcd97190dfbb:0">@error-color: #f5222d; // error state color</span></span>

6

<span key="927f150e072746e1b41bf9d0c27ce32c"><span offset-key="927f150e072746e1b41bf9d0c27ce32c:0">@font-size-base: 14px; // major text font size</span></span>

7

<span key="60562958e47b4e1282cb597d516ec62f"><span offset-key="60562958e47b4e1282cb597d516ec62f:0">@heading-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); // heading text color</span></span>

8

<span key="82a0cdc07e8e4282ac62a2087e9cf53b"><span offset-key="82a0cdc07e8e4282ac62a2087e9cf53b:0">@text-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65); // major text color</span></span>

9

<span key="f44b0600985d4e5eac2b4c2a6939cd85"><span offset-key="f44b0600985d4e5eac2b4c2a6939cd85:0">@text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45); // secondary text color</span></span>

10

<span key="012858302d65482baa1c48b93ae5be40"><span offset-key="012858302d65482baa1c48b93ae5be40:0">@disabled-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25); // disable state color</span></span>

11

<span key="2d9cfa563aa84e08837800af1314b9c3"><span offset-key="2d9cfa563aa84e08837800af1314b9c3:0">@border-radius-base: 2px; // major border radius</span></span>

12

<span key="f5e05d3345804038a496ed3c9bc345fb"><span offset-key="f5e05d3345804038a496ed3c9bc345fb:0">@border-color-base: #d9d9d9; // major border color</span></span>

13

<span key="e9ed857c361d4647beeae24a945c6686"><span offset-key="e9ed857c361d4647beeae24a945c6686:0">@box-shadow-base: 0 3px 6px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 6px 16px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08),</span></span>

14

<span key="9b8d176e171b40448c5d56c61ab7b2a8"><span offset-key="9b8d176e171b40448c5d56c61ab7b2a8:0"> 0 9px 28px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); // major shadow for layers</span></span>

## 

<span key="2e70c8528888423298b2154487a0a074"><span offset-key="2e70c8528888423298b2154487a0a074:0">How to do it</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#How-to-do-it" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ea3348a4ab334437937ba535b5211405" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4046c0c8922149e0abd9400a6a20ca5d"><span data-offset-key="4046c0c8922149e0abd9400a6a20ca5d:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="3d20bfcfda2540f3b0d5139d83dc4b4d"><span offset-key="3d20bfcfda2540f3b0d5139d83dc4b4d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="829fe217c391416dbd9d1c7d1446cbf6"><span offset-key="829fe217c391416dbd9d1c7d1446cbf6:0">We will use </span></span><a href="http://lesscss.org/usage/#using-less-in-the-browser-modify-variables" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ba9112daccdc4451b023859e42882d30" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c4ef6679172049508f71a45ded2a7efd"><span data-offset-key="c4ef6679172049508f71a45ded2a7efd:0">modifyVars</span></span></span></a><span key="b66c95213d004466b1dd0676f5d23bac"><span offset-key="b66c95213d004466b1dd0676f5d23bac:0"> provided by less.js to override the default values of the variables, You can use this </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/create-react-app-antd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="52cee926a5cf4ab2a342315ec4c9b4ba" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="bd63e200788c4d568c5f992402425cca"><span data-offset-key="bd63e200788c4d568c5f992402425cca:0">example</span></span></span></a><span key="1fb4aea6f0d449138555bb06e9a1ad73"><span offset-key="1fb4aea6f0d449138555bb06e9a1ad73:0"> as a live playground. We now introduce some popular way to do it depends on different workflow.</span></span>

### 

<span key="57d408e2c59a49a7982a93f9c0bfb904"><span offset-key="57d408e2c59a49a7982a93f9c0bfb904:0">Customize in webpack</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Customize-in-webpack" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fbe07a0db21449d6b9c13c41f9efee6c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="6b2331530bcf4f158e289fab1e9be263"><span data-offset-key="6b2331530bcf4f158e289fab1e9be263:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="100d8911be3b4c7fb3da6c15b25a516f"><span offset-key="100d8911be3b4c7fb3da6c15b25a516f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="30aaa0d8f7e640068965e2fc4fa6940e"><span offset-key="30aaa0d8f7e640068965e2fc4fa6940e:0">We take a typical </span>`webpack.config.js`<span offset-key="30aaa0d8f7e640068965e2fc4fa6940e:2"> file as example to customize its </span></span><a href="https://github.com/webpack-contrib/less-loader" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d078dee878114e489e2543edebaedf6a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="0428219d6f274010968cef7ac5b0b4a0"><span data-offset-key="0428219d6f274010968cef7ac5b0b4a0:0">less-loader</span></span></span></a><span key="6f7fb4dd17ca4a95acd8300ccc517a22"><span offset-key="6f7fb4dd17ca4a95acd8300ccc517a22:0"> options.</span></span>

1

<span key="2aec56d388a3407a80c4e906926aa344"><span offset-key="2aec56d388a3407a80c4e906926aa344:0">// webpack.config.js</span></span>

2

<span key="dc7266b122a64f67b25581edaa32f220"><span offset-key="dc7266b122a64f67b25581edaa32f220:0">module.exports = {</span></span>

3

<span key="ec2f268770ab4c4c90f88674dd377f73"><span offset-key="ec2f268770ab4c4c90f88674dd377f73:0"> rules: \[{</span></span>

4

<span key="8a04a40ae370462db704f629d6e7be99"><span offset-key="8a04a40ae370462db704f629d6e7be99:0"> test: /\\.less$/,</span></span>

5

<span key="0eb6f145880944bab2f9f1b8cf4fdf26"><span offset-key="0eb6f145880944bab2f9f1b8cf4fdf26:0"> use: \[{</span></span>

6

<span key="715d06959c7f40b9a0fbe0b9ff7e5b3a"><span offset-key="715d06959c7f40b9a0fbe0b9ff7e5b3a:0"> loader: 'style-loader',</span></span>

7

<span key="ff7efed756704b9fa85736633d626391"><span offset-key="ff7efed756704b9fa85736633d626391:0"> }, {</span></span>

8

<span key="e5ce2ef02e1944ff84a2ca88e6233152"><span offset-key="e5ce2ef02e1944ff84a2ca88e6233152:0"> loader: 'css-loader', // translates CSS into CommonJS</span></span>

9

<span key="5ce18784a9cb49c9a342f5a449d41d9f"><span offset-key="5ce18784a9cb49c9a342f5a449d41d9f:0"> }, {</span></span>

10

<span key="685abfc0a7c74048ad68a6662020806a"><span offset-key="685abfc0a7c74048ad68a6662020806a:0"> loader: 'less-loader', // compiles Less to CSS</span></span>

11

<span key="46c3f6bcfac448688808b80e0dc9e4e1"><span offset-key="46c3f6bcfac448688808b80e0dc9e4e1:0">+ options: {</span></span>

12

<span key="d6d4ef1de434438e86aaf5bbc8927034"><span offset-key="d6d4ef1de434438e86aaf5bbc8927034:0">+ lessOptions: { // If you are using <a href="../../../../../cdn-cgi/l/email-protection.html" class="__cf_email__">[email protected]</a> please spread the lessOptions to options directly</span></span>

13

<span key="02395e69b0214bc6ae80521cc33681fa"><span offset-key="02395e69b0214bc6ae80521cc33681fa:0">+ modifyVars: {</span></span>

<span key="14cfcda5a6cf47b8b70ab35eb4fbd931"><span offset-key="14cfcda5a6cf47b8b70ab35eb4fbd931:0">+ 'primary-color': '#1DA57A',</span></span>

15

<span key="c7b7fb2effae4dd39e842fde0f1f526a"><span offset-key="c7b7fb2effae4dd39e842fde0f1f526a:0">+ 'link-color': '#1DA57A',</span></span>

16

<span key="dc1319c596dc4b85a8d5f281f430d466"><span offset-key="dc1319c596dc4b85a8d5f281f430d466:0">+ 'border-radius-base': '2px',</span></span>

19

<span key="44487b30f7704326bc1f7d2f83f0df4a"><span offset-key="44487b30f7704326bc1f7d2f83f0df4a:0">+ },</span></span>

<span key="f0620638fe754c778ebd2b4b3e2065da"><span offset-key="f0620638fe754c778ebd2b4b3e2065da:0">Note:</span></span>

1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
    <span key="b649b832752946be90ba5f46c678d167"><span offset-key="b649b832752946be90ba5f46c678d167:0">Don't exclude </span>`node_modules/antd`<span offset-key="b649b832752946be90ba5f46c678d167:2"> when using less-loader.</span></span>

2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
    <span key="8a442c8818884e82aeb8fd4b72e6bfea">`lessOptions`<span offset-key="8a442c8818884e82aeb8fd4b72e6bfea:1"> usage is supported at </span></span><a href="https://github.com/webpack-contrib/less-loader/releases/tag/v6.0.0" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="10ac750f838b4e51bb71cb39ff84237c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="bc42bd9b590848cfac109d823d11e9e1"><span data-offset-key="bc42bd9b590848cfac109d823d11e9e1:0"><span class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="325e5741411f5e5d5356574072041c021c02">[email protected]</span></span></span></span></a><span key="424a5fae9b034e0f98c25c926eda8e2a"><span offset-key="424a5fae9b034e0f98c25c926eda8e2a:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="b7d308456b90432494e053c51dc955f1"><span offset-key="b7d308456b90432494e053c51dc955f1:0">Customize in Umi</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Customize-in-Umi" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5e56a319b1424ce9a844028a1b87b7a3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e72253dfb372490d813893221afa3491"><span data-offset-key="e72253dfb372490d813893221afa3491:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="8a65a20abde04064858ae3aaaf829d54"><span offset-key="8a65a20abde04064858ae3aaaf829d54:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a4de6786af454d6bb7de2502ccdd66c1"><span offset-key="a4de6786af454d6bb7de2502ccdd66c1:0">You can easily use </span></span><a href="https://umijs.org/config/#theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="69865939ad034e5f90df286f0a084c16" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="e20244b5b015486d9af95d03d2d9a3a8"><span data-offset-key="e20244b5b015486d9af95d03d2d9a3a8:0">theme</span></span></span></a><span key="1116c257290a44d3893e48a429615d17"><span offset-key="1116c257290a44d3893e48a429615d17:0"> field in </span>`.umirc.ts`<span offset-key="1116c257290a44d3893e48a429615d17:2"> or </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-pro/blob/v5/config/config.ts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="84f454cfb9bd4c22ac3456975c81c35e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="bbd3df8beb5b4fed8d10781f3123616e"><span data-offset-key="bbd3df8beb5b4fed8d10781f3123616e:0">config/config.ts</span></span></span></a><span key="4b5a0c6cc1a24089a8db310b56f7c173"><span offset-key="4b5a0c6cc1a24089a8db310b56f7c173:0"> file of your project root directory if you are using </span></span><a href="http://umijs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="51f2be1e6e134c11ba0470720f77b61d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="88148a3933ce4f5b8eaed7dcb4e878a3"><span data-offset-key="88148a3933ce4f5b8eaed7dcb4e878a3:0">Umi</span></span></span></a><span key="f220498d2922486084ac16f54b476222"><span offset-key="f220498d2922486084ac16f54b476222:0">, which could be an object or a javascript file path.</span></span>

<span key="dd424d962c5440e6a64acbfa7194100f"><span offset-key="dd424d962c5440e6a64acbfa7194100f:0">"theme": {</span></span>

### 

<span key="18f4251f4eea470cb6a858a99b5b8d61"><span offset-key="18f4251f4eea470cb6a858a99b5b8d61:0">Customize in create-react-app</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Customize-in-create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c8d92fbf4f6640ba9c8ade64ee433216" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="a2104380ef7540aab62b67a10446f73b"><span data-offset-key="a2104380ef7540aab62b67a10446f73b:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="d5ab9b21e0954322ba15f78bbc241393"><span offset-key="d5ab9b21e0954322ba15f78bbc241393:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a5b462cc10d440b781163881b4d8f8c1"><span offset-key="a5b462cc10d440b781163881b4d8f8c1:0">Follow </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-with-create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3775d7afbc8043beaa0c24920e9bed61" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="1dbe910eebff44c2ba4da1b94b9bb2e4"><span data-offset-key="1dbe910eebff44c2ba4da1b94b9bb2e4:0">Use in create-react-app</span></span></span></a><span key="2022f9e27b294d4ab47bac42deae251a"><span offset-key="2022f9e27b294d4ab47bac42deae251a:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="55eaa7c828524c6aa08e4e0e789e6c91"><span offset-key="55eaa7c828524c6aa08e4e0e789e6c91:0">Customize in less file</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Customize-in-less-file" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6a435d8dbd904d3dbc99053b708fe167" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="5b188fbf8c3e4679893589db54966186"><span data-offset-key="5b188fbf8c3e4679893589db54966186:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="b91824c9869542079d027ea794a98dc6"><span offset-key="b91824c9869542079d027ea794a98dc6:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a7606f40d42d419d94161556ad8103a2"><span offset-key="a7606f40d42d419d94161556ad8103a2:0">Another approach to customize theme is creating a </span>`less`<span offset-key="a7606f40d42d419d94161556ad8103a2:2"> file within variables to override </span>`antd.less`<span offset-key="a7606f40d42d419d94161556ad8103a2:4">.</span></span>

1

<span key="05fe7f9397b5474cb8b856eb23fb0a4e"><span offset-key="05fe7f9397b5474cb8b856eb23fb0a4e:0">@import '~antd/lib/style/themes/default.less';</span></span>

2

<span key="bb7a594464bf42889e17e4d4cd602408"><span offset-key="bb7a594464bf42889e17e4d4cd602408:0">@import '~antd/dist/antd.less'; // Import Ant Design styles by less entry</span></span>

3

<span key="5936a37079f3469a900e15b2444fae52"><span offset-key="5936a37079f3469a900e15b2444fae52:0">@import 'your-theme-file.less'; // variables to override above</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="149b6b63772a4e5d9b50de9dd5cb0204"><span offset-key="149b6b63772a4e5d9b50de9dd5cb0204:0">Note: This way will load the styles of all components, regardless of your demand, which cause </span>`style`<span offset-key="149b6b63772a4e5d9b50de9dd5cb0204:2"> option of </span>`babel-plugin-import`<span offset-key="149b6b63772a4e5d9b50de9dd5cb0204:4"> not working.</span></span>

### 

<span key="67ed946851914468b6058f2bb455b351"><span offset-key="67ed946851914468b6058f2bb455b351:0">Dynamic theme</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Dynamic-theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bf5b8a5a9c9c4281b7cfeac1b1585b96" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="ce32046870fb44e0bd640ad5d2a5edf5"><span data-offset-key="ce32046870fb44e0bd640ad5d2a5edf5:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="0a78d7d766c64b8f9227da86cf719261"><span offset-key="0a78d7d766c64b8f9227da86cf719261:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="18dde1dad0e142da9b86d8a4d222bc3f"><span offset-key="18dde1dad0e142da9b86d8a4d222bc3f:0">Runtime update theme color please </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme-variable" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="00519ba2bac74b1ab79f35c483a9cb5d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="9c0ccb2919c1413ea344769bef6c120d"><span data-offset-key="9c0ccb2919c1413ea344769bef6c120d:0">ref this doc</span></span></span></a><span key="1702e192fefa4e4d9edbe93a710bfd50"><span offset-key="1702e192fefa4e4d9edbe93a710bfd50:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="0b82a5f7fce946e18357450b868f45ba"><span offset-key="0b82a5f7fce946e18357450b868f45ba:0">How to avoid modifying global styles?</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#How-to-avoid-modifying-global-styles" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="202dccd7d0a34e9bad18b70b9c5f5b33" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="35b88fac44f64257a9c080c9c312e159"><span data-offset-key="35b88fac44f64257a9c080c9c312e159:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="609d3c72a6234906a2cb13a17940a68f"><span offset-key="609d3c72a6234906a2cb13a17940a68f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="4ccc34a220194393809fc3485542b58f"><span offset-key="4ccc34a220194393809fc3485542b58f:0">Currently ant-design is designed as a whole experience and modify global styles (eg </span>`body`<span offset-key="4ccc34a220194393809fc3485542b58f:2"> etc). If you need to integrate ant-design as a part of an existing website, it's likely you want to prevent ant-design to override global styles.</span></span>

<span key="94cfe833248a47e49fca4378f4586621"><span offset-key="94cfe833248a47e49fca4378f4586621:0">While there's no canonical way to do it, you can take one of the following paths :</span></span>

### 

<span key="9dbbd9da550a4fd2a3e43c336098fb18"><span offset-key="9dbbd9da550a4fd2a3e43c336098fb18:0">Configure webpack to load an alternate less file and scope global styles</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Configure-webpack-to-load-an-alternate-less-file-and-scope-global-styles" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ae5f2f2948b74aedae8361f64aba151d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="cf4e6372529c44d1a7a79f4ad719f9db"><span data-offset-key="cf4e6372529c44d1a7a79f4ad719f9db:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="d6e4eb9ce3a6435094a1916efd5230d9"><span offset-key="d6e4eb9ce3a6435094a1916efd5230d9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="1b7bf84b95854767ba10ba58931ab577"><span offset-key="1b7bf84b95854767ba10ba58931ab577:0">It's possible to configure webpack to load an alternate less file:</span></span>

1

<span key="8fbffbfae0ec406bb306bc3965b4a4a4"><span offset-key="8fbffbfae0ec406bb306bc3965b4a4a4:0">new webpack.NormalModuleReplacementPlugin( /node\_modules\\/antd\\/lib\\/style\\/index\\.less/, path.resolve(rootDir, 'src/myStylesReplacement.less') )</span></span>

2

<span key="57189fd370564605886296c0dc777cc1"><span offset-key="57189fd370564605886296c0dc777cc1:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

3

<span key="fe6eafdb3a094fd484da918105bee37b"><span offset-key="fe6eafdb3a094fd484da918105bee37b:0">#antd { @import '~antd/lib/style/core/index.less'; @import '~antd/lib/style/themes/default.less'; }</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="e40531f0e8cc489a9c5b3bef672c2583"><span offset-key="e40531f0e8cc489a9c5b3bef672c2583:0">Where the src/myStylesReplacement.less file loads the same files as the index.less file, but loads them within the scope of a top-level selector : the result is that all of the "global" styles are being applied with the #antd scope.</span></span>

### 

<span key="ea5f5190dcb84f4da95a4fced18d6fb0"><span offset-key="ea5f5190dcb84f4da95a4fced18d6fb0:0">Use a postcss processor to scope all styles</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Use-a-postcss-processor-to-scope-all-styles" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5d755a43872f405db8241ae43c266205" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="21e06b5265284417a58639a81300257b"><span data-offset-key="21e06b5265284417a58639a81300257b:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="935dbc9cc0004542ade8f6f79a31724d"><span offset-key="935dbc9cc0004542ade8f6f79a31724d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="58629e4339204041840a80075fcb1ccd"><span offset-key="58629e4339204041840a80075fcb1ccd:0">See an example of usage with </span></span><a href="https://gist.github.com/sbusch/a90eafaf5a5b61c6d6172da6ff76ddaa" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="509f76450b4c4df3805fd585bec5fadd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="0d5ed2266bc94671b0cbfd699d4cd351"><span data-offset-key="0d5ed2266bc94671b0cbfd699d4cd351:0">gulp and postcss-prefixwrap</span></span></span></a><span key="b84f6ce4e4ee4cd1aeb50cea04b8d008"><span offset-key="b84f6ce4e4ee4cd1aeb50cea04b8d008:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="c63fccc5f40e4ada839f0ff0715f6f8e"><span offset-key="c63fccc5f40e4ada839f0ff0715f6f8e:0">Not working?</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Not-working" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f30e65b5bd094a7896937150b9bacf77" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f12696516e7b4408b04909f88f14b9df"><span data-offset-key="f12696516e7b4408b04909f88f14b9df:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="4980057bb407461d82af677c00b80d98"><span offset-key="4980057bb407461d82af677c00b80d98:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a1e8bbfde14a49c9b7bd322b0e93008d"><span offset-key="a1e8bbfde14a49c9b7bd322b0e93008d:0">You must import styles as less format. A common mistake would be importing multiple copied of styles that some of them are css format to override the less styles.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="ec871682b7b14b04a78fccdd3f50e093"><span offset-key="ec871682b7b14b04a78fccdd3f50e093:0">If you import styles by specifying the </span>`style`<span offset-key="ec871682b7b14b04a78fccdd3f50e093:2"> option of </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/babel-plugin-import" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a0a509b672ea4757afdc4354eba4b37b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d1abd680a05c4851b644790ff1875425"><span data-offset-key="d1abd680a05c4851b644790ff1875425:0">babel-plugin-import</span></span></span></a><span key="17c4cbb445e04f29bce3804d04a3274d"><span offset-key="17c4cbb445e04f29bce3804d04a3274d:0">, change it from </span>`'css'`<span offset-key="17c4cbb445e04f29bce3804d04a3274d:2"> to </span>`true`<span offset-key="17c4cbb445e04f29bce3804d04a3274d:4">, which will import the </span>`less`<span offset-key="17c4cbb445e04f29bce3804d04a3274d:6"> version of antd.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="5e845e09532d4466b18595cad1aee74b"><span offset-key="5e845e09532d4466b18595cad1aee74b:0">If you import styles from </span>`'antd/dist/antd.css'`<span offset-key="5e845e09532d4466b18595cad1aee74b:2">, change it to </span>`antd/dist/antd.less`<span offset-key="5e845e09532d4466b18595cad1aee74b:4">.</span></span>

<span key="a15c66e30200460cb25d8de7891f9e9a"><span offset-key="a15c66e30200460cb25d8de7891f9e9a:0">We have some official themes, try them out and give us some feedback!</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1e134895e8884c10be47d3e7bf52e75c"><span offset-key="1e134895e8884c10be47d3e7bf52e75c:0">🌑 Dark Theme (supported in 4.0.0+)</span></span>

    <span key="99f8cca151404586b0449a8f32d9d795"><span offset-key="99f8cca151404586b0449a8f32d9d795:0">📦 Compact Theme (supported in 4.1.0+)</span></span>

    <span key="1d3bceaaac04472a87891d53ee03ed88"><span offset-key="1d3bceaaac04472a87891d53ee03ed88:0">☁️ </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-aliyun-theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5934e8312ee14d6d93bce487a6fd7bdb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c3c23766d7b54c129ba001bead22c63a"><span data-offset-key="c3c23766d7b54c129ba001bead22c63a:0">Aliyun Console Theme (Beta)</span></span></span></a><span key="0540b5542dcd45d4a45b4ef737336699"><span offset-key="0540b5542dcd45d4a45b4ef737336699:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="0de994a062b5444dbde97852d1fe5ad2"><span offset-key="0de994a062b5444dbde97852d1fe5ad2:0">Use dark or compact theme</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme#Use-dark-or-compact-theme" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f617fc4b117344fabf5c1c24beb09caa" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4a1fb72fbba14d25b18d7611cf7168da"><span data-offset-key="4a1fb72fbba14d25b18d7611cf7168da:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="8827a87f6243481db2c6a9d77f33ddfb"><span offset-key="8827a87f6243481db2c6a9d77f33ddfb:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="1762a743f7dd4ff89afb4f9c095f14bc"><span offset-key="1762a743f7dd4ff89afb4f9c095f14bc:0">Method 1: using Umi 3</span></span>

<span key="47070e9154c34e5a97072c0dabee20fd"><span offset-key="47070e9154c34e5a97072c0dabee20fd:0">If you're using </span></span><a href="http://umijs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d80c66dae51b4194a7a85a1c8ae394a5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="83dd397214544faf87caa0d79e97c22e"><span data-offset-key="83dd397214544faf87caa0d79e97c22e:0">Umi 3</span></span></span></a><span key="299958a12ed343d780178719a865cac5"><span offset-key="299958a12ed343d780178719a865cac5:0">:</span></span>

1

<span key="42c290b4f1e049a2ae33ac9a9a6d0085"><span offset-key="42c290b4f1e049a2ae33ac9a9a6d0085:0">// .umirc.ts or config/config.ts</span></span>

2

<span key="e238d96bf52c4fdd95a40e339b3f932a"><span offset-key="e238d96bf52c4fdd95a40e339b3f932a:0">export default {</span></span>

3

<span key="821c0382b7ab402a9c3e0c9d5a4206c7"><span offset-key="821c0382b7ab402a9c3e0c9d5a4206c7:0"> antd: {</span></span>

4

<span key="489902865e2944e589da7beab0d90a09"><span offset-key="489902865e2944e589da7beab0d90a09:0"> dark: true, // active dark theme</span></span>

5

<span key="25035e7b8f0244b182ada230b3d56629"><span offset-key="25035e7b8f0244b182ada230b3d56629:0"> compact: true, // active compact theme</span></span>

6

<span key="f26414f39bc6433db3e0668864122ab9"><span offset-key="f26414f39bc6433db3e0668864122ab9:0"> },</span></span>

7

<span key="4aea240358ab4c15b88e0cd43657d04d"><span offset-key="4aea240358ab4c15b88e0cd43657d04d:0">},</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="b89c5cc9b1c34764b80ca44576470116"><span offset-key="b89c5cc9b1c34764b80ca44576470116:0">Method 2: Import </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/browse/antd@4.x/dist/antd.dark.less" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="26d6a5640b3b41bd922c8188406f7566" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="dbdd62f063684edb8d1872c6bff3fbb8"><span data-offset-key="dbdd62f063684edb8d1872c6bff3fbb8:0">antd/dist/antd.dark.less</span></span></span></a><span key="1e395f98fcbe47f8a99c604ecc15ee43"><span offset-key="1e395f98fcbe47f8a99c604ecc15ee43:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/browse/antd@4.x/dist/antd.compact.less" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="62b3dc5578ed459692234703c6e5a958" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="2fa1108e52e54825a9af2ad3c672c243"><span data-offset-key="2fa1108e52e54825a9af2ad3c672c243:0">antd/dist/antd.compact.less</span></span></span></a><span key="619560eec4dd4255aaa439f7661025a2"><span offset-key="619560eec4dd4255aaa439f7661025a2:0"> in the style file:</span></span>

1

<span key="0e186a8eac454279b23d56e828167f90"><span offset-key="0e186a8eac454279b23d56e828167f90:0">@import '~antd/dist/antd.dark.less'; // Introduce the official dark less style entry file</span></span>

2

<span key="579a9201ae3345848a7b0b33a56c5df6"><span offset-key="579a9201ae3345848a7b0b33a56c5df6:0">@import '~antd/dist/antd.compact.less'; // Introduce the official compact less style entry file</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="55053dbb486a46908298a49a43c91cb9"><span offset-key="55053dbb486a46908298a49a43c91cb9:0">If the project does not use Less, you can import </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/browse/antd@4.x/dist/antd.dark.css" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5870b575bbd244d694e5d21e9f69e9cb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d2ffd8cb1fa24878bac23ff38ef617e9"><span data-offset-key="d2ffd8cb1fa24878bac23ff38ef617e9:0">antd.dark.css</span></span></span></a><span key="30b2be653eb046d8907f546e6acf4a87"><span offset-key="30b2be653eb046d8907f546e6acf4a87:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/browse/antd@4.x/dist/antd.compact.css" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ab482a1e1b4541d4822cca8f2fd3b1be" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4c736ff7355e44e8b24bba0f23f19639"><span data-offset-key="4c736ff7355e44e8b24bba0f23f19639:0">antd/dist/antd.compact.css</span></span></span></a><span key="552be5f2c6ee4a0a9049105918e3a63c"><span offset-key="552be5f2c6ee4a0a9049105918e3a63c:0"> in the CSS file:</span></span>

1

<span key="37f30194334e46d588aeaba01bb5c7a1"><span offset-key="37f30194334e46d588aeaba01bb5c7a1:0">@import '~antd/dist/antd.dark.css';</span></span>

2

<span key="45ab7cc8b9134e60bf4e4a5bc788dcc1"><span offset-key="45ab7cc8b9134e60bf4e4a5bc788dcc1:0">@import '~antd/dist/antd.compact.css';</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

> <span key="9306d15b056b4e0997bb86a5001f4f32"><span offset-key="9306d15b056b4e0997bb86a5001f4f32:0">Note that you don't need to import </span>`antd/dist/antd.less`<span offset-key="9306d15b056b4e0997bb86a5001f4f32:2"> or </span>`antd/dist/antd.css`<span offset-key="9306d15b056b4e0997bb86a5001f4f32:4"> anymore, please remove it, and remove babel-plugin-import </span>`style`<span offset-key="9306d15b056b4e0997bb86a5001f4f32:6"> config too. You can't enable two or more theme at the same time by this method.</span></span>

<span key="6196919a2edd4e929c1389b705ea1fd8"><span offset-key="6196919a2edd4e929c1389b705ea1fd8:0">Method 3: using </span></span><a href="https://github.com/webpack-contrib/less-loader" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a4457b78fa9a419ea088c41f120cc418" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="3c6157b6f76d40359a56c4fcbda525bf"><span data-offset-key="3c6157b6f76d40359a56c4fcbda525bf:0">less-loader</span></span></span></a><span key="9c85a13ab0b94f3f9311aed6bb4f84b4"><span offset-key="9c85a13ab0b94f3f9311aed6bb4f84b4:0"> in </span>`webpack.config.js`<span offset-key="9c85a13ab0b94f3f9311aed6bb4f84b4:2"> to introduce as needed:</span></span>

1

<span key="7803df010803423499a33e3ce0a666cf"><span offset-key="7803df010803423499a33e3ce0a666cf:0">const { getThemeVariables } = require('antd/dist/theme');</span></span>

2

<span key="acd74ca601b046a19437c7a2376b820e"><span offset-key="acd74ca601b046a19437c7a2376b820e:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

# 

<span key="a27b15876acd4070a93ac99f3f3fcc01"><span offset-key="a27b15876acd4070a93ac99f3f3fcc01:0">Replace Moment.js</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="0bc5270e46054a3a91e7342a5195998a"><span offset-key="0bc5270e46054a3a91e7342a5195998a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#Custom-component" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="db2d7c0b730e49f19aa154b6157ec190" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="f404901aa8c140b685366476b7422e09"><span data-offset-key="f404901aa8c140b685366476b7422e09:0">Custom component</span></span></span></a><span key="f04eb0a0a62e4d42adfa4d01f2931d71"><span offset-key="f04eb0a0a62e4d42adfa4d01f2931d71:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="8e0ef7be0cba48fd95a41aee0e221c9e"><span offset-key="8e0ef7be0cba48fd95a41aee0e221c9e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9bf744411a244083b15e6ac99b2ef18c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="739a4e5905684ff2b353e2f6acc9af78"><span data-offset-key="739a4e5905684ff2b353e2f6acc9af78:0">antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin</span></span></span></a><span key="c6a172f4efd745d39c27c9aeccbd2b86"><span offset-key="c6a172f4efd745d39c27c9aeccbd2b86:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="c97fa2c21b7342d3aa4fa4dc1ace2edf"><span offset-key="c97fa2c21b7342d3aa4fa4dc1ace2edf:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#Use-date-fns" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d5e338cc0d6b46cfb4a001a2ca6d2a35" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="fa22f86191df47ff89a0c8517f10753d"><span data-offset-key="fa22f86191df47ff89a0c8517f10753d:0">Use date-fns</span></span></span></a><span key="575a9703648b48d4b06a753fd2b7554b"><span offset-key="575a9703648b48d4b06a753fd2b7554b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="2a03650da4e440108decb9c82c0a5f0e"><span offset-key="2a03650da4e440108decb9c82c0a5f0e:0">You might want to replace Moment.js with another date library (\*\*Ant design currently supports </span></span><a href="https://day.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="00f4a695f50f4ec7b3adb6cf1f79036a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="d20a59c74a4f4a77b2008f0e7dfa17ab"><strong>dayjs</strong></span></span></a><span key="25b6e7f97fe14a81b6fb0e913045f796"><span offset-key="25b6e7f97fe14a81b6fb0e913045f796:0"> and \*\*</span></span><a href="https://date-fns.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="df8d3dbd1a6942adb2229cd688bae47f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b9a3b4f2bfa043cb9a0e8868d876535a"><strong>date-fns</strong></span></span></a><span key="45fd1fce8f8c4e78b2414b8224eabaad"><span offset-key="45fd1fce8f8c4e78b2414b8224eabaad:0">) to reduce bundle size. We provide two ways to customize:</span></span>

## 

<span key="bfdfb79a2dc34a33a8159c6e0668c84c"><span offset-key="bfdfb79a2dc34a33a8159c6e0668c84c:0">Custom component</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#Custom-component" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="862ecf6a32914de89029019b679a4e44" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="4d8f6253217d45d18752847778655d2a"><span data-offset-key="4d8f6253217d45d18752847778655d2a:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="02a50b0be667470885b42c34b1ad766d"><span offset-key="02a50b0be667470885b42c34b1ad766d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="123d6f56be02451a8bc2c28f66c305e0"><span offset-key="123d6f56be02451a8bc2c28f66c305e0:0">The first way is to use </span>`generatePicker`<span offset-key="123d6f56be02451a8bc2c28f66c305e0:2"> (or </span>`generateCalendar`<span offset-key="123d6f56be02451a8bc2c28f66c305e0:4">) to help create Picker components.</span></span>

<span key="0bd4ddb16ecc4265930d624fa9132e15"><span offset-key="0bd4ddb16ecc4265930d624fa9132e15:0">First, we initialize an antd demo with </span>`create-react-app`<span offset-key="0bd4ddb16ecc4265930d624fa9132e15:2">. You can refer to </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/use-in-typescript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e4ea52004a23453a9bc9812314b9935a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="28141943e21e42599cf322bbb6772a24"><span data-offset-key="28141943e21e42599cf322bbb6772a24:0">Use in TypeScript</span></span></span></a><span key="a2ab8ce01204459e802f61a9cc76a955"><span offset-key="a2ab8ce01204459e802f61a9cc76a955:0">, or you can start directly here </span></span><a href="https://github.com/xiaohuoni/antd4-generate-picker/commit/47fec964e36d48bd15760f8f5abcb9655c259aa6" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0adadd8fc5b9431599fc57f87248ff10" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="959e8aff7ad24fcaaf0306c3d954f819"><span data-offset-key="959e8aff7ad24fcaaf0306c3d954f819:0">init antd</span></span></span></a><span key="9cb0b25f84d6497db037ab1db21c9cc9"><span offset-key="9cb0b25f84d6497db037ab1db21c9cc9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="666ea1c477934aa3b52eafe6576e7329"><span offset-key="666ea1c477934aa3b52eafe6576e7329:0">antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6a8699f4dd5143e19aec33493d841709" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b0b0717cf6044d3c9ba2cfb0bf28f8be"><span data-offset-key="b0b0717cf6044d3c9ba2cfb0bf28f8be:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="f7649387014c4a82bbb51f16988def70"><span offset-key="f7649387014c4a82bbb51f16988def70:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="e71fb1e56d6d486ba57d5e6cae8f4ec6"><span offset-key="e71fb1e56d6d486ba57d5e6cae8f4ec6:0">We also provide another implementation, which we provide with </span>`antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin`<span offset-key="e71fb1e56d6d486ba57d5e6cae8f4ec6:2">, replacing </span>`momentjs`<span offset-key="e71fb1e56d6d486ba57d5e6cae8f4ec6:4"> with </span>`Day.js`<span offset-key="e71fb1e56d6d486ba57d5e6cae8f4ec6:6"> directly without changing a line of existing code. More info can be found at </span></span><a href="https://github.com/ant-design/antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="dab4067099374ff5ace0a0dfcc958432" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="b00d115cc65546f5aec68e9b86701117"><span data-offset-key="b00d115cc65546f5aec68e9b86701117:0">antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin</span></span></span></a><span key="bd45bab939bd432493a74061dbf34153"><span offset-key="bd45bab939bd432493a74061dbf34153:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="d95d5360964c46ecb5aaf0a924709401"><span offset-key="d95d5360964c46ecb5aaf0a924709401:0">// webpack-config.js</span></span>

2

<span key="c5fdd584168a413281882e2640a195e6"><span offset-key="c5fdd584168a413281882e2640a195e6:0">import AntdDayjsWebpackPlugin from 'antd-dayjs-webpack-plugin';</span></span>

3

<span key="13270e7b9e4b4be099565111ce447322"><span offset-key="13270e7b9e4b4be099565111ce447322:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

4

<span key="9237da6dfc394244aa763f46e0e91c42"><span offset-key="9237da6dfc394244aa763f46e0e91c42:0">module.exports = {</span></span>

5

<span key="fc8ed7d31e9840848869516fbd74f1ab"><span offset-key="fc8ed7d31e9840848869516fbd74f1ab:0"> // ...</span></span>

6

<span key="0ecc34404e364caab7219357f27f9d87"><span offset-key="0ecc34404e364caab7219357f27f9d87:0"> plugins: \[new AntdDayjsWebpackPlugin()\],</span></span>

7

<span key="03c71ce92e3a4897b472f1ca164bd639"><span offset-key="03c71ce92e3a4897b472f1ca164bd639:0">};</span></span>

## 

<span key="9781a954651144fe80e20e5a2cea2195"><span offset-key="9781a954651144fe80e20e5a2cea2195:0">Use date-fns</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#Use-date-fns" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d113142ff11e460ea67e1fa733270203" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="c89782ebf44945dfbab4622e0e506f5d"><span data-offset-key="c89782ebf44945dfbab4622e0e506f5d:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="526d14faa3844024b4732227d3c4f06c"><span offset-key="526d14faa3844024b4732227d3c4f06c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="d637c29b190242319770ce2a2d03366a"><span offset-key="d637c29b190242319770ce2a2d03366a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://date-fns.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bf5452e248294655b63c6efd179006fd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="71e4cd6cfdb944b9bcf2caa75c0a3091"><span data-offset-key="71e4cd6cfdb944b9bcf2caa75c0a3091:0">date-fns</span></span></span></a><span key="8dc1c29891874c47aca0b0ec176a26cf"><span offset-key="8dc1c29891874c47aca0b0ec176a26cf:0"> currently supports custom component methods similar to </span>`dayjs`<span offset-key="8dc1c29891874c47aca0b0ec176a26cf:2">. The difference is that the parameter types used are different. Support is provided in antd 4.5.0 and above.</span></span>

<span key="fddd656cb9e343e886856abcccaaa1b6"><span offset-key="fddd656cb9e343e886856abcccaaa1b6:0">For Example:</span></span>

### 

<span key="96df547c7e3944bea158bc8d25d22551"><span offset-key="96df547c7e3944bea158bc8d25d22551:0">DatePicker.tsx</span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/react/replace-moment#DatePicker.tsx" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e8901acb03534251916628b68e6224bd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-9945_259-9946-237__"><span data-key="5e3103d79b0442628bd0ce4637e2536c"><span data-offset-key="5e3103d79b0442628bd0ce4637e2536c:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="eaf1b9fdf27142d5928233c84bca472d"><span offset-key="eaf1b9fdf27142d5928233c84bca472d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="c5f53f1edd9a4913ba5139328e16d085"><span offset-key="c5f53f1edd9a4913ba5139328e16d085:0">Create </span>`src/components/DatePicker.tsx`<span offset-key="c5f53f1edd9a4913ba5139328e16d085:2">.</span></span>

<span key="2c7e199246774951b0a8746a545d3099"><span offset-key="2c7e199246774951b0a8746a545d3099:0">Code as follows:</span></span>

1

<span key="cc59fda7ab134919884cd86ad936e939"><span offset-key="cc59fda7ab134919884cd86ad936e939:0">import dateFnsGenerateConfig from 'rc-picker/lib/generate/dateFns';</span></span>

2

<span key="60e61e9343ba4e53b977df7380309d34"><span offset-key="60e61e9343ba4e53b977df7380309d34:0">import generatePicker from 'antd/es/date-picker/generatePicker';</span></span>

3

<span key="cd441fd6bda34d2488e304c47127ed77"><span offset-key="cd441fd6bda34d2488e304c47127ed77:0">import 'antd/es/date-picker/style/index';</span></span>

4

<span key="f78348380fbb46b486a1ad3a8481eb08"><span offset-key="f78348380fbb46b486a1ad3a8481eb08:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

5

<span key="038b3b5d8bec4619877b1e56923cdc5c"><span offset-key="038b3b5d8bec4619877b1e56923cdc5c:0">const DatePicker = generatePicker&lt;Date>(dateFnsGenerateConfig);</span></span>

6

<span key="24be9348c0e04b9a9c12d1054e503974"><span offset-key="24be9348c0e04b9a9c12d1054e503974:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

7

<span key="54a800a2495e4c3b9ef788ee8544a3d8"><span offset-key="54a800a2495e4c3b9ef788ee8544a3d8:0">export default DatePicker;</span></span>

# 

<span key="ea156a0afe9845f39811627064719b6a"><span offset-key="ea156a0afe9845f39811627064719b6a:0">FAQ:</span></span>

# 

<span key="b6c3e5ea23c8453eac570c637ca8f3c8"><span offset-key="b6c3e5ea23c8453eac570c637ca8f3c8:0">Design Critiques</span></span>

## 

<span key="200c75a19c2a4f9db0a00847b8e7551f"><span offset-key="200c75a19c2a4f9db0a00847b8e7551f:0">What are Design Critiques?</span></span>

<span key="2cd3abc1dd934b5abb5b849bcbddb17e"><span offset-key="2cd3abc1dd934b5abb5b849bcbddb17e:0">In Design Critiques, UX Engineers meet with the Design Manager at least once per sprint to present their design progress and planning for group discussion.</span></span>

## 

<span key="05c6cb918c9c489eaf36c089422dae2d"><span offset-key="05c6cb918c9c489eaf36c089422dae2d:0">Our Goals</span></span>

<span key="ff9232fb03134c80b50b096cfc476f69">**Go Deeper on Core Design Concepts**</span>

<span key="8e263055f0c540119394f10254ad3aea"><span offset-key="8e263055f0c540119394f10254ad3aea:0">These sessions are an opportunity to empower you with a more nuanced understanding of UI/UX that you can </span>**carry into interviews**<span offset-key="8e263055f0c540119394f10254ad3aea:2">.</span></span>

<span key="8600cacb974d4ab5a34288ff7dae99fe">**Reinforce the Curriculum**</span>

<span key="215f7e75d46d4fb79c36259750058d65"><span offset-key="215f7e75d46d4fb79c36259750058d65:0">By walking through active projects together throughout development, we'll naturally encounter </span>**clear, real-world case studies**<span offset-key="215f7e75d46d4fb79c36259750058d65:2"> that provide examples of best practices.</span></span>

<span key="979fb8edc3f1477ba4b1089f507e8090">**Level Up Your Product's Quality**</span>

<span key="f9389ed03a6d4fd18634dbc208b51234"><span offset-key="f9389ed03a6d4fd18634dbc208b51234:0">Design Critiques are a great opportunity to practice </span>**giving and receiving feedback**<span offset-key="f9389ed03a6d4fd18634dbc208b51234:2"> in the context of team development.</span></span>

## 

<span key="ff0265e7d0674c0daf280415c0f8f9fd"><span offset-key="ff0265e7d0674c0daf280415c0f8f9fd:0">Agenda</span></span>

### 

<span key="8c87aaba19424735988f8244cf8e5f69"><span offset-key="8c87aaba19424735988f8244cf8e5f69:0">Pick Volunteers</span></span>

<span key="4d58ebf58bf343f78ce9eb84bf642bf8"><span offset-key="4d58ebf58bf343f78ce9eb84bf642bf8:0">We'll pick on a few UX Engineers to walk us through what they're working on!</span></span>

### 

<span key="7f281c1fd51345bb8839d2186c97842d"><span offset-key="7f281c1fd51345bb8839d2186c97842d:0">Design Lead Presentations</span></span>

<span key="6669c2b0819547d0a55da7142c680a94">**Introduction**</span>

<span key="ebb60f0bcd5e47139d7a502ff59e0d9b"><span offset-key="ebb60f0bcd5e47139d7a502ff59e0d9b:0">Each UX Engineer on the presenting team should give a </span>*very brief*<span offset-key="ebb60f0bcd5e47139d7a502ff59e0d9b:2"> introduction of themselves and their design experience, then they should introduce their product to provide context.</span></span>

<span key="58a6f41872c04e75aa767ea12fa0a91d">**Product Demo**</span>

<span key="4f5e5ddca4f34627918c4c844184e619"><span offset-key="4f5e5ddca4f34627918c4c844184e619:0">With someone sharing their screen, the UX Engineer should collaboratively walk through either the live deployed version or a relevant local version of the product. The Design Manager facilitates a group discussion identifying aspects of the product demonstrating good UI/UX principles as well as aspects needing improvement.</span></span>

<span key="10cfca7c3f094280a42adc8593207de7">**Planning Artifact Presentation**</span>

<span key="d80669637ff748e29561a3278b017654"><span offset-key="d80669637ff748e29561a3278b017654:0">With someone sharing their screen, the Design Leads should collaboratively walk through any design planning artifacts they've got (e.g. user flows, wireframes). The Design Manager facilitates a group discussion about the artifacts, the general design direction, and UI/UX concerns relevant to their product.</span></span>

<span key="9444a91e1d1b451e9daad60c34eaf08d"><span offset-key="9444a91e1d1b451e9daad60c34eaf08d:0">Now read on to see how </span>**Product Reviews**<span offset-key="9444a91e1d1b451e9daad60c34eaf08d:2"> work in Labs.</span></span>

<a href="https://bryan-guner.gitbook.io/my-docs/v/lambda-labs/ux/untitled/ux-design/facebook-graph-api" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-14lw9ot r-190qawg r-z2wwpe r-rs99b7 r-4dj0k7 r-1loqt21 r-1quu1zo r-1ro0kt6 r-18u37iz r-16y2uox r-1wbh5a2 r-nsbfu8 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>
